Raxtz: Tee redſehß/ eekſchan kattru tee duhruſchi gir.
Pehtz Wackarà/ kad nu ta Ꞩattaiſẜama=deena by/ kattra
gir tee Preekſch=ſwähtki/ nahze Joſeps no Arimathia/
to Jällghawu to Juddo/ weens bagghatz Wiers/ weens
Rahts=Kungs/ labbs rahms Wiers/ tas nhe by nhe kahdu
Paddomu teem dewis py winjo buhſchanas/ katters
vs Deewa Wallſtibu ghaidiya/ aiſto tas by weens Mahzeklis
JEſu/ tomähr ſläppäne/ biedams preekſchan teem
Juddeem/ tas eedrohſchenayahß/ vnd ghaya eekſchan py
Pilato/ vnd luhdſe/ ka tam waļļa buhtu nojembt tahß
Meeſẜas JEſu. Bett Pilatus brienoyahß/ ka tas jaw by
nomiris/ vnnd aitzenaya to Pillßkungu/ vnd jautaya
tam/ jaugh Wings ẜenn by nomirris? Vnd kad tas ißklauſẜiya
no Pillßkungu/ dewe tas Joſepam tahß Meeſẜas
JEſu vnd pawehleya/ tam by winju doht. Vnd Joſeps
pirrka Audäklu.
Bett irr Nicodemus nahze/ katters zittu reis Nackty
py JEſu nahzis by/ vnd attneſẜe Myrrhes vnd Aloes ẜajauktus
py ẜimbtu Mahrzing. Tad jehme tee tas Meeſẜas
JEſu katras nojämbtas by/ vnd eetinna thaß eekſchan
weenu ſkieſtu Audäklu/ vnd ẜehye winju ar Linna=
auteem/ vnd ar tahm dahrgahm Sahlehm/ ka tee Juddi
eeradduſchi by aprackt.
Bett turr by tanny weetà/ kurr Wings tappa Kruſtà
ẜiſts/ weens Dahrß/ vnd eekſchan Dahrſu weena jauna
Kappa/ ta peederreya Joſepam/ kattru tas by litzeeß ißzirrſtees
weenà Ackminy/ eekſchan kattru wehl nheweens
by eelicktz/ turr patt eelicka tee JEſum/ ta Ꞩattaiſẜama=
deena dehļ to Juddo/ ka tee Swähtki jaw preekſcha/ vnd
ta Kappa tuwe by/ vnd wehle weenu Ackmini preekſchan
tahm Durrweem tha Kappa/ vnd ghaya nohſt. Bett
turr patt by Maria Maddaļa/ vnd Maria Joſes/ tee apẜähdahß
prett to Kappu/ irr zittas Ꞩeewas/ kattri JEſum
arridſan by packaļļ nakuſchas/ no Galilea/ ſkattiyahß/
Kurrpu/ vnd ka winya Meeſẜas nolicktas tappa.
Bett tee attkal attghreeſehß/ vnd ẜattaiſẜiya tahß dahrghas
Sahles/ vnnd to Swaidiſchanu/ vnnd par teem
Swähtkeem by tahß kluſẜe pehtz ẜawu Teeſẜu.
Ohtrà Deenà/ kattra nahk pehtz to Ꞩattaiſẜamudeenu/
nahze tee AuxtiBaßnizaskungi vñ Wariſeeri weena
draudſeh py Pilato/ vnd ẜatziya: Kungs/ mehß äſẜam attghadayuſchees/
ka ſchiß Willtineex ẜatziya/ dſiewodams:
Es ghribbu pehtz trim Deenahm aukſcham zellteeß/ tapehtz
pawehl/ ka ta Kappa tohp apẜarrghata/ ihs to treſſchu
deenu/ ka nhe nahk winja Mahzekļi/ vnd ſohg winju/
vñ ſacka teem Ļaudeem: Wings gir aukſcham zehlees no
teem Mirroņeem/ vñ tohp ta pehdeya Willtiba nicknaka/
nhe ka ta pirrma. Pilatus ẜatziya vs teem: The gir jums
tee Ꞩarrghi/ eita/ vnd ghlabboyeeta/ ka ſinnadammi: Tee
noghaya/ vnnd apẜarrghaya to Kappu ar Ꞩarrgheem/
vnd aiß=ſpehde to Ackmini.
Ende der Hiſtorien des Leidens
CHriſti.
Lettiſche Evangelia vnd
Epiſteln/ von Oſtern an biß auffs
Advent.
Epiſtel am heiligen Oſtertage/
1. Corinth. 5.
MYļi Brahļi/ juhſẜo leeloſchana nhe
gir labba/ nhe ſinnaht juhß/ ka maß
Raugs wiſẜu Mieklu ẜaraudſeh. Tapehtz
ißmehſeeta to wätzu Raugu/ ka
juhß jauna Miekla eſẜeeta/ ihten ka juhß
nhe eejauti eſẜeeta. Aiſto mums gir arridſan
weens Leeldeenas jährs/ tas gir
CHriſtus preekſchan mums vppärähtz. Tapehtz laideeta
mums Leeldeen turreht/ nhe eekſchan wätzu Raugu/ neds arridſan
eekſchan Raugu tahß blehdibas vnnd ļaunumu/ bett
eekſchan to ẜalldu Mieklu tahß Tyhribas vnd Taißnibas.
Evangelium am Heiligen Oſtertage/
Marci am 16. Cap.
VNnd kad tee Leeldeenas=Swähtki
paghayuſchi
by/ pirrka Maria
Maddaļa/ vnd Maria
Jäcoba/ vñ Salome dahrgas
Sahles/ ka tahß nahktu/
vnd ſwaidietu to Kungu
JEſum. Vnnd tahß
nahze py to Kappu/ vs
weenu Swehdenu ļohte aggre/ kad ta Ꞩaule vslehze/
vnd tahß runnaya ẜawa ſtarrpa/ kas noweļļ mums to
Ackmini no tahß Kappas Durrweem? Vnnd tahß noſkattiyahs/
vnd nomanniya/ ka tas Ackminns nowälltz
by/ aiſto tas by ļohte leels. Vnd tahß eeghaya eekſchan
Kappas/ vnd redſeya weenu jaunu Puiſẜi/ py labbahß
Rohkas ẜehſchoht/ tas by ar gharru balltu Drehb aptährptz/
vnd tahß (Ꞩeewas) iſẜabiyayahß. Bett wings
ẜatziya vs tahm/ Nhe iſẜabyeſtatees/ juhß meckleyeeta
JEſum no Nazareth/ katters py Kruſtu ẜiſts by/ tas gir
aukſcham zehleeß/ vnd nhe gir ſcheitan. Redſeeta ſcheit
to Weetu/ kur tee to nolicka. Bett no=eyta/ vnd ẜackaita
to winja Mahzekļeems/ vnd Peteram/ ka tas juhſẜo
preekſcha no=eesno ees eekſchan Galilea/ tur juhß to redſeſẜeeta/
ka tas jums ẜatziyis gir.
Vnd tahß (Ꞩeewas) ißghaya peepehſche aran/ vnd
behdſe no to Kappu/ aiſto tahm by drebbeſchana vnnd
iſẜabiyaſchana vsghayuſẜi/ vnd nhe ẜatziya nheweenam
nheneeka/ aiſto tahß biyayahß.
Epiſtel am Oſtermontage/
Actorum 10.
PEteris attdarriya ẜawu Mutt/ vnd ſatziya/ Nu es itt teſcham
nomanu/ ka Deews to Zillwäku nhe vsluhko/
bett eekſchan wiſẜenadem Ļaudeem/ kattri to byeſtahß/
vnd pareiſe darra/ tas tam pattick. Juhß ſinnaht no to
Mahzibu/ kattru Deews teem Bährneem Jſraël ẜuhtiyis
gir/ vnd litzis ſluddenaht to Meeru zaur JESVM CHriſtum
(katters gir weens Kungs par wiſẜahm leetahm) kattra
zaur wiſẜu Juddoſemm notickuſẜi gir/ vnd eeẜahkta eekſchan
Galilea pehtz tahß Chriſtibas/ kattru Jahnis mahziya/ ka
Deews to paſſchu JESVM no Nazareth ẜwaidiyis gir/
ar to Ꞩwähto Gharru vnd to ſpähku/ katters wiſẜas mallas
apſtaighayis gir/ vnd gir labbe darriyis/ vnd wäſẜälus darriyis
wiſẜus/ kattri no Wällu vswahräti by. Aiſto Deews by ar to.
Vnd mehs äſẜam Leezeeneeki par wiſẜahm tahm leetahm/ ko
tas darriyis gir/ eekſchan Juddoſemmes/ vnd eekſchan
Jeruſalem. To gir tee nokahwuſẜchi/ vnd py weenu Kohku
pakaruſẜchi. To paſſchu gir Deews vsmohdenayis/ tan treſſchan
Deenan/ vñ to litzis ſinnamu tapt/ nhe wiſẜeem Ļaudeem/
bett mums/ teem papreekſche ißrädſäteem Leezeneekeem no
Deewu kattri mehs ar to ehduſchi vnd dſäruſchi äſẜam/ pehtz to
laiku/ ka tas aukſcham zehlees gir no teem Mirroņeem. Vnd
tas gir mums pawehleyis to mahziet teem Ļaudeem/ vnd
apleezenaht/ ka tas gir eeſtahdietz no Deewu/ weens Ꞩohgis
par Dſieweem vnd Mirroņeem. No ẜcho dohd wiſẜi Proweetes
leezibu/ ka zaur winja Wahrdu/ wiſẜeem/ kattri eekſchan
to titz/ pammeſſchanu to Ghräko dabbuit buhß.
Evangelium am Oſtermontage/
Luc. 24. Cap.
REdſi/ diwi no teem
Mahzekļeem ghaya
tanny paſſchà Deenà eekſchan
weenu Jällghawu/
ta by no Jeruſalem diwi
Juhds ſemmes tahļ/ tahß
Wahrds gir Emahus.
Vnnd tee runnaya ẜawà
ſtarrpà/ no wiſẜahm tahm
leetahm/ kattri by notickuſſchi. Vnd tas notickahß/ kad
tee tha runnaya/ vnnd apyautayahß ẜawà ſtarrpà/ peeghaya
JEſus py teem/ vnd ſtaigaya ar teem. Bett winjo
Atzis tappa turrätas/ ka tee to nhe paſinna. Bett
tas ẜatziya vs teem/ kahda gir ta Walloda/ kattru juhß
juhſẜo ſtarrpà runnayeeta vs zeļļu/ vnnd eſẜeeta tick noſkummuſẜchi?
Tad adbilldeya weens ar wahrdu Cleowas/
vnd ẜatziya vs to: Tuggi tad weens eſẜi tick ſweſſch
eekſchan Jeruſalem/ katters nhe ſinnatu/ kas ſchinnys
Deenahß tur eekſchan notitzis gir? Vnd wings ẜatziya
vs teem: Kas? Bett tee ẜatziya vs to: Tas/ no JEſu no
Nazareth/ katters by weens Proweetz/ warrähns no
Darrbeem vnd Wahrdeem preekſchan Deewu vnd wiſẜeem
Ļaudeem/ ka to muhſẜi Auxti Baßnizaskungi vnd
Wirſẜeneeki nodäwuſſchi gir py Noẜohdiſchanas tahß
Nahwes/ vnd py Kruſtu ẜittuſchi. Bett mehs zerreyam
tam by Jſraeli attpeſtiet. Vnnd par to wiſẜu/ gir ſchodeen
ta treſſcha Deena/ ka ſchahdas leetas notickuſchi
gir. Arridſan gir mums ißbeedeyuſchi zitti no muhſẜahm
Ꞩeewahm/ tahs gir aggre py to Kappu biyuſchi/
vnd nhe gir winja Meeſẜu attradduſchi/ nahk vnd ẜacka:
Tee gir weenu Ghiem tho Engeļo redſeyuſchi/ katters
ẜacka: Wings Dſiewoyohtz. Vnnd zitti no mums noghaya
py to Kappu/ vnd attradda tha/ ka thaß Ꞩeewas
ẜatziya/ bett winju nhe attradda tee.
Vnd tas ẜatziya vs teem/ O juhß Jecki vnd kuhtri no
Ꞩirrdehm/ ka juhß nhe ghribbaht titzeht wiſẜu to/ ko tee
Proweetes ẜatziyuſchi gir. Nhe by CHriſtum tha zeeſt/
vnd eekſchan ẜawas Ghohdibas ee=eedt? Vnd eeẜahka
no Moſe/ vnd no wiſẜeem Proweetem/ vnd ißſtahſtiya
teem wiſẜu Raxtu/ katters no to ẜatzietz by.
Vnd tee nahze tuwe preekſchan to Jällgawu/ vs kurrenes
tee ghaya/ vnnd tas lickahß iht ka ghribbädams
wehl tahlahk eet. Vnd tee luhdſe to/ vnd ẜatziya/ Palleetz
py mums/ aiſto tas ghribb Wackars tapt/ vnnd ta
Deena gir pa ghallam. Vnd tas eeghaya eekſchan/ ka
tas py teem palliektu. Vnd tas notickahß/ kad tas ar
teem py Ghalldu ẜehdeya/ jehme tas to Mais/ patteitze/
pahrlauſe to/ vnd dewe to teem. Tad tappa winja Atzis
attwährtas/ vnd paſinna to. Vnd tas paſudda preekſchan
teem.
Vnnd tee ẜatziya ẜawà ſtarrpà: Nhe dedſe muhſẜa
Ꞩirrds eekſchan mums/ kad tas ar mums runnaya wirſẜon
zellu/ kad tas mums to Raxtu iß=ſtahſtiya? Vnnd
tee zehlehß aukſcham tanny paſſchà ſtundà/ greeſehß attkal
apkahrt vs Jeruſalem/ vnd attradda tohß Weenpaddeßmittus
(Mahzekļus) kopa ẜakratus/ vnd tohß kattri
py teem by/ kattri ẜatzia/ tas Kungs gir pattees aukſcham
zehlees/ vnd Simoņam paradiyees. Vnd tee paẜatziya
teem/ kas vs zeļļu notitzis by/ vnd ka tas no teem paſietz
by py to/ kad tas teem to Mais lauſe.
Epiſtel am Oſterdinſtage/
Actor.
13. Cap.
JVhß Wyeri/ myļi Brahļi/ juhß Bährni no to zilltu
Abrahama/ vnd kattri juhſẜo ſtarrpà Deewu biya. Jums
gir tas Wahrds tahß Peſtiſchanas ẜuhtietz/ aiſto tee kattri
eekſchan Jeruſalemes dſiewo/ vnd winja Wirſẜeeneeki/ pehtz
to ka tee to nhe paſinna/ neds tohß Ballxnus tho Proweeto
(kattri ick=Ꞩwehdeenohß laſẜiti tohp) gir tee tohß paſſchus ar
ẜawu Teeẜaſchanu peepilldiyuſchi. Vnd jeb tee nhe kahdu
Wainu tahß Nahwes py to attradda/ luhdſe tee tomähr Pilatum/
to nokauth. Vnd kad te pabeighuſſchi by/ wiſẜu kas no to
raxtietz gir/ jehme tee to no Kohku/ vnd licka to eekſchan weenu
Kappu. Bett Deews gir to vsmohdenayis no teem Mirroņeem/
vñ tas gir paradiyees dauds Deenahß/ teem/ kattri ar to
no Galilea vs Jeruſalemes ghayuſchi by/ kattri gir winja Leezeneeki
py teems Ļaudeems. Vnd mehs paſluddenayam jums arridſan
to Ꞩohliſchanu/ kattra muhſẜeem Tähweem notickuſẜi
gir/ ka tas patz Deews mums/ ẜaweem Bährneem peepilldiyis
gir/ ar to/ ka tas JEſum vsmohdenayis gir.
Evangelium am Oſterdingſtage/
Luc. 24. Cap.
KAd tee Mahzekļi no to (aukſcham zellſchanu JEſu)
runnaya/ ſtahweya JEſus patz widdu ſtarrpan
teem/ vnd ẜatziya vs teem/ Meers gir ar jums. Bett tee
iſẜabiyayahß/ vnd ſkitta tee
rädſätu weenu Gharru.
Vnnd wings ẜatziya vs
teem: Ka eſẜeeta juhß tick
iſẜabiyuſſchees? Vnnd kapehtz
nahk tahdas dohmas
juhſẜahß ẜirrdies? Redſeeta
mannas Rohkas/ vnd
mannas Kahyas/ es äßmu
pattz. Tauſtaita mann/ vnd luhkoyeeta/ aiſto weenam
Gharram nhe gir Meeſẜas vnnd Kauli/ ka juhß rädſaht
mann äſẜam. Vnd kad tas to ẜatziya/ rahdiya tas
teem Rohkas vnnd Kahyas. Bett kad tee wehl nhe titzeya
no Preeku/ vnd brienoyahß/ ẜatziya tas vs teem:
Gir jums ſcheitan kas ja=ähd? Vnd tee zehle tam preekſchan
weenu ghabbalu no zäptu Siwi vnd Mäddu.
Vnd tas jehme to/ vnnd ehde to winjo preekſcha. Bett
tas ẜatziya vs teem: Tee gir tee Wahrdi/ kattrus es vs
jums ẜatziyu/ py jums wehl buhdams. Aiſto tam buhß
wißnotaļļ peepillditam tapt/ kas no mann raxtietz gir/
eekſchan to Baußlu Moſi/ eekſchan teem Proweeteem/
vnd eekſchan teem dſeeßmeem. Tad attwehre tas teem
to Ꞩappraſſchanu/ ka tee to Raxtu ẜappratta/ vnd ẜatziya
vs teem: Tha ſtahw raxtietz/ vnd tha by Chriſtum
zeeſt/ vnnd atkal aukſcham zellteeß no teem Mirroņeem
treſſchà Deenà/ vnd lickt mahziet/ eekſchan winja Wahrdu
Attſtahſchanu/ vnnd Pammeſchanu to Ghräko wiſẜeem
Ļaudeem/ vnd eeẜahkt eekſchan Jeruſalem.
Epiſtel am erſten Sontage nach Oſtern/ ge-
nant
Quaſimodogeniti,
1. Johan. 5.
JCk kattris kas no Deewu peedſimbtz gir/ tas pahrwarr to
Paſẜaul/ vñ muhſẜa Titziba gir ta Pahrwarreſchana/ kattra
to Paſẜaul pahrwarreyis gir. Bett kas gir/ kas to Paſẜaul
pahrwarr/ ka ween/ kas titz/ ka JEſus Deewa Dähls gir?
Schiß gir/ kas nahk/ ar Vhdeni vnd Aſẜini/ JEſus CHriſtus/
nhe ar Vhdeni ween/ bett ar Vhdeni vnd Aſẜini. Vnd
tas Gharrs gir/ katters leezibu dohd/ ka tas Gharrs Teeſẜiba
gir. Aiſto tries gir/ kattri leezibu dohd wirſẜon Semmes/
Tas Gharrs/ vnd tas Vhdens/ vnd tas Aſẜins/ vnd tee tries
gir weenà kohpà. Kad mehß nu to Zillwäko leezibu vs jämmam/
tad gir Deewa leeziba leelaka. Aiſto Deewa leeziba
gir ta/ ka tas leezibu dewis gir no ẜawu Dählu/ kas eekſchan
to Deewa Dählu titz/ tam gir tahda leeziba py ẜöw.
Evangelium am erſten Sontage nach
Oſtern/ genant
Quaſimodogeniti,
Joh. 20.
TAnni paſſchà Swehdeenas Wackarà/ kad tee
Mahzekli ẜaghayuſchi/ vnnd tahß Durrwis aiß=
ſlähktas by/ no ißbailes par teem Juddeem/ nahze JEſus/
vnd ſtahweya widdu/
vñ ẜatziya vs teem: Meers
gir ar jums. Vnnd to ẜatzijis/
radija wings teem
Rohkas vnnd ẜawu Ꞩahnu.
Tad tappa tee Mahzekli
liexmi/ rädſädammi
to Kunghu: Tad ẜatzija
JEſus attkal us teem:
Meers gir ar jums. Jhten ka mann taß Tähws ẜuhtijis
gir/ tha ẜuhtu es juhß. Vnd to ẜatziyis/ puhte tas
vs teem/ vnnd ẜatziya vs teem: Jemmeeta to ſwähtu
Gharru/ kattreem juhß tohß Ghräkus pammettieſẜeeta/
teems gir tee pammäſti/ vnnd kattreems juhß tohß patturrehſẜeeta/
teems gir tee patturrähti. Bett Thomas
weens no teem Diwipaddeßmitteem/ katters noẜauktz
Dwienis/ nhe by py teem/ kad JEſus nahze. Tad ẜatziya
tee zitti Mahzekli vs to/ mehß äſẜam to Kungu redſeyuſſchi.
Bett wings ẜatziya vs teem/ ja tas tha nhe
noteek/ ka es eekſchan winja Rohkahm rädſu tahß Nagglo=Sie-
vnd leeku mannu Pirrxtu eekſchan winja
Ꞩahneem/ nhe ghribbu es to titzeht.
Vnd par aſtohņ deeneem by winja Mahzekli attkal
turr eekſchan/ vnd Thomas ar teem/ nahk JEſus/ kad
tahß Durrwis aisſlähktas by/ vnnd ſtahweya widdu
teem/ vnd ẜatziya: Meers gir ar jums. Pehtz to ẜatziya
vs Thomu/ ſteep ſchurr tawu Pirrxtu/ vnd reds mannas
Rohkas/ vnnd ſteep tawu Rohku ſchurr/ vnd leetz to
mannohß Ꞩahnohß/ vnnd nhe eſẜi nhetitziegs/ bett tittziegs.
Thomas ẜatziya vs to: Manns Kungs/ vñ manns
Deews/ JEſus ẜatziya vs to: Tapehtz/ ka tu mann redſeyis
eſẜi Thoma/ tad titzi tu. Swähti gir tee/ kattri
nhe räds/ vnd tomähr titz.
Jrr dauds zittas Siemes darriya JEſus preekſchan
ẜaweem Mahzekleem/ kattri nhe gir raxtiti eekſchan ſcho
Ghramatu. Bett ſchee gir raxtiti/ ka juhß titzaht/ JEſus
gir CHriſt/ tas Deewa Dähls/ vnd ka jums zaur to
Titzibu ta Dſiewiba gir/ eekſchan winja Wahrdu.
Epiſtel am andern Sontage nach Oſtern/
genant
Miſericordias Domini.
MYļi Brahli/ Tapehtz eſẜeeta juhß aitzenati ihten ka CHriſtus
zeetis gir muhſẜo dehl/ vnd mums weenu Preekſch=
Siem attſtahyis/ ta jums buhß pehtz ſtaigaht winja
Kahya=pähdeem. Katters nhe kahdus Ghräkus darriyis gir/
neds arridſan kahda Willtiba ẜawà Mutteh attraſta gir/ katters
nhe lammaya prettie/ kad tas lammahtz tappa/ neds
draudeya/ zeeßdams. Bett tas pawehleya tam/ katters teeſcham
teſẜa. Katters muhſẜus Ghräkus patz vppereyis gir/ py
ẜawahm Meeſẜahm wirſẜon to Kohku/ ka mehs no teem Ghräkeem
nomirruſchi äſẜam/ vnd tai Taißnibai dſiewoyam/ zaur
kattra Wahtehm juhß ẜadſeedenati äſẜaht. Aiſta juhß biyaht
ka tahß apallohtas Ahwis/ bett nu eſẜetta juhß attgreeſti/ py
to Ghannu vnd Pieſkopu juhſẜo Dwehſẜeļo.
Evangelium am andern Sontage nach
Oſtern/ genant
Miſericordias Domini,
Johan. 10.
JEſus ẜatziya vs teem Juddeem: Es äßmu weens
labbs Ghanns/ weens labbs Ghanns dohd ẜawu
Dſiewibu par tahm Ahweem.
Bett weens ẜaddärähtz
Ghanns/ katters
Ghanns nhe gir/ kam tahß
Ahwis nhe peedärr/ räds
to Willku nahkoht/ vnnd
attſtahy tahß Ahwis/ vnd
bähg. Vnd tas Willx ẜakamp
vnd ißtränntz tahß
Ahwis. Bett tas ẜaddärähtz Ghanns bähg/ Aiſto tas
gir ẜaddärähtz/ vnd nhe ohla tahß Ahwis. Es äßmu
weens labbs Ghanns/ vnd ſinnu mannas Ahwis/ vnd
winyi paſieſt mann. Lieds ka mann mans Tähws paſieſt/
vnd es paſieſtu to Tähwu/ vnnd es dohmu ẜawu
Dſiewibu par tahm Ahweem. Vnd mann gir wehl zittas
Ahwis/ tahß nhe gir no ſchahß Kuhts/ (
Dunaeburg.
& Seelburg. Pronunciant
Klähwa) vnd tahß paſſchas buhß
mann arridſan ſcheitan daweſt/ vnd tahß dſirrdehß mannu
Ballxni/ vnd buhß weenam Ahwya=Pullkam vnnd
weenam Ghannam buht.
Epiſtel am dritten Sontage nach Oſtern/
genant
Iubilate,
1. Petr. 2.
MYļi Brahļi/ es peeminnu jums/ ka tohß Ꞩweſẜcheneekus
vnd
(hoc innuit Graecum vocabulum
parepidemos)
no tahļenes attnahkuſchus Ļaudis/ noturraitees no
tahß meeſẜas Kahribas/ kattri pretty to Dwehſẜel zieniyahß/
vnd dſiewoyeeta labbe ſtarrpan teem Paggaņeem/ ka tee/ kattri
jums aprunna/ ka Ļaundarritayus/ juhſẜus labbus darrbus
räds/ vnd Deewu teitz/ kad tas nu preekſch deenu nahx.
Eſẜeeta packlauſẜigi wiſẜai Zillwehzigai Raddibai/ tha Kunga
dehļ/ jeb tas gir tam Koninjam/ ka tam Wirſẜeeneekam/ jeb
teem Pills Kunngeem/ ka teem kattri no teem ẜuhtiti gir/
par ẜohdu teem Laundarritayeem/ vnd par Ꞩlawu teem labbeem.
Aiſto tas gir Deewa Prahtz/ ka juhß ar labbdarriſchanu
aisbahſeeta to Nheſinnaſchanu to Jegkigo Zillwäko/ ka tee
Leimanņi/ vñ nhe ka buhtu jums ta Leimanniba par Apklahſchanu
tahß blehdibas: Bett ka tee Deewa Kallpi/ parradaita
ickweenam Ghohdu/ myļoyeeta tohß Brahļus/ byeeta Deewu
ghohdaita to Koninju.
Evangelium am dritten Sontage nach
Oſtern/ genant
Iubilate,
Joh. 15.
JEſus ẜatziya vs ẜaweem mahzekleem: Par wenu
maſu briedi/ tad juhß mann nhe redſeſẜeeta/ vnd attkal
par weenu maſu briedi/ tad juhß mann redſeſẜeeta/
Aiſto es eemu py Tähwu. Tad ẜatziya zitti no winja
Mahzekleem ẜawà ſtarrpà: Kas gir tas/ ka tas vs mums
ẜacka/ par weenu maſu briedi/ tad juhß mann nhe redẜeeſẜeeta/
vnnd attkal par weenu maſu briedi tad juhß
mann redſeſẜeeta/ vnnd ka es py Tähwu eemu? Tad ẜatziya
tee/ kas gir tas/ ka tas ẜacka/ par weenu maſu briedi?
Mehs nhe ſinnam/ ko tas runna. Tad nomanniya
JEſus/ ka tee tam ghribbeya
jautaht/ vnnd ẜatziya
vs teem: Par to juhß apjautateeß
juhſẜo ſtarrpà/ ka
es ẜatziyis äßmu/ Par weenu
maſu briedi/ tad juhß
mann nhe redſeſẜeeta/ vnd
attkal par weenu maſu
briedi/ tad juhß mann redſeſẜeeta.
Pattees/ pattees/ es ẜacku jums/ juhß raudahſẜeeta
vnd kaukſẜeeta/ bett tha Paſẜaule preezahſẜees.
Bett juhß buhſẜeeta noſkummuſſchi. Bett juhſẜai Noſkumſchanai
buhß par Preeku tapt.
Weena Ꞩeewa/ kad ta wäddahß/ tad gir ta noſkummuſẜi/
Aiſto winjas ſtunda gir daggajuſẜi. Bett
kad tha to Bährnu peedſimmuſẜi gir/ tad nhe peeminn
ta wairs tahß ẜahpes/ tahß liexmibas dehļ/ ka tas Zillwähx
eekſchan tahß Paſẜaules peedſimmis gir. Vnnd
juhß arridſan eſẜeeta noſkummuſchi/ bett es ghribbu
juhß attkal redſeht/ vnd juhſẜajuſẜa Ꞩirrds liexmohſẜees/ vnd
juhſẜu liexmibu nhe buhß nhe weenam no jums attjembt.
Vnd tanny paſſchà Deenà juhß mann nheneeka
jautahſẜeeta.
Epiſtel am vierden Sontage nach Oſtern/
genant
Cantate,
Jacobi 1.
MYļi Brahļi/ nhe alloyeetees/ wiſẜi labbi dahwani/ vnd
wiſẜi pillnigi dahwani nahk no aukſchenes ſemmeh/ no
to Tähwu tahß ghaiſſchumas/ py kattru nhe gir nhekada
Pahrwehrſchana/ neds Mains tahß ghaiſſchumas vnd tahß
tumſẜibas/ Tas gir mums peedſimmis pehtz ẜawu Prahtu/
zaur to Wahrdu tahß teeſẜibas/ ka mehs buhtam tee Pirrmaki
ẜawas Raddibas. Tapehtz myļi Brahļi/ ickweenam
Zillwäkam buhß attkielam buht dſirrdeht/ bett palähnam
runnaht/ vnd kuhtram dußmoht/ Aiſto ta Zillwäka dußmiba
nhe darra kas Deewam pa prahtam gir. Tapehtz leezeeta
nohſt wiſẜu Nheſkieſtibu/ vnd blehdibu/ vnd vsjemmeeta to
Wahrdu ar Lehnprahtibu/ katters eekſchan jums eeſtahdietz
gir/ katters warr juhſẜus Dwehſẜeļļus ẜwähtus darrieth.

Cantate,

JEſus ẜatziya vs ẜaweem mahzekleem: Nu no=eemu
es py to/ kas mann ẜuhtiyis gir/ vnd nhe weens ſtarrpan
jums jautha mann/
kur tu no=eẜinoe=ẜi? Bett tadehļ/
ka es to vs jums runnayis
äßmu/ gir juhſẜa Ꞩirrds
pilla noſkumſchanas tappuſẜi:
Bett es ẜacku jums
to teeſcham/ Tas gir jums
labb/ ka es no=eemu. Aiſto
ja es nhe no=eemu/ tad nhe
nahk tas Eeepreezenatais py jums. Bett ja es no=eemu/
tad ghribbu es to jums ẜuhtiet. Vnd kad tas patz
nahk/ tas to Paſẜaul ẜohdies/ par teem Ghräkeem/ par
to Taißnibu/ vnnd par to Ꞩohdu. Par teem Ghräkeem/
ka tee eekſchan mann nhe titz. Bett par to Taißnibu/
ka es py Tähwu eemu/ vnnd juhß mann joprohyam
wairs nhe redſeſẜeeta. Par to Ꞩohdu/ ka tas Kungs
ſchahß Paſẜaules noteeſẜahtz gir.
Mann gir jums wehl dauds ja=ẜacka/ bett juhß nhe
warreeta to taggad paneſt/ bett kad wings tas Gharrs
tahß Taißnibas nahx/ tas jums wiſẜenadà Taißnibà
waddieß. Aiſto tas no ẜöw paſſcham nhe runnahß/ bett
ko tas dſirrdehß/ to tas runnahß/ vnd nahkoſchus leetas
tas jums paſluddenahß. Tas patz mann apſkaidrohß/
Aiſto no manneem Wahrdeem tas jems/ vnd jums paſluddenahß.
Wis kas tam Tähwam gir/ tas peedärr
mann/ tapehtz äßmu es ẜatziyis/ tas no manneem Wahrdeem
jems/ vnd jums paſluddenahß.
Epiſtel am fünfften Sontage nach Oſtern/
genant
Vocem Iucunditatis,
Jacobi 1.
MYļi Brahļi/ Darraita pehtz to Wahrdu/ vnd nhe dſirrdeeta
ween/ ar to juhß jums peewiļļatees. Aiſto kad
kaßlabba tickai ween dſirrd to Wahrdu/ vnd nhe darra
arridſan pehtz to/ tas gir ihten ka weens Wiers/ katters ẜawu
meeſẜigu Waigu eekſchan Speegeli apluhko/ Aiſto kad
wings apluhkoyees gir/ eet wings tudeļļ nohſt/ vnd aismirrſt
kahdà waighà tas biyis gir. Bett kas czaur luhkoyahß eekſchan
to pillnigu Baußli/ tahß Swabbadibas/ vnd turr eekſchan
palleek/ vnnd nhe dſirrd aißmirrßdams/ bett darridams/
tas patz buhß ſwähtz ẜawà darrbà. Bett ja kaßlabba
juhſẜo ſtarrpà zerre/ tas kallpoyohtz Deewam/ vnd nhe wallda
ẜawu Mehl/ bett peewiļļ ẜawu Ꞩirrdi/ ta Deewa=Kallpoſchanna
gir wellte. Weena ſkieſta vnnd nheapghanita Deewa=Kallpoſchanna
preekſchan Deewu to Tähwu gir ta/ katters
Barinus vnd Attraittnes ẜawahß bähdahß apluhko/ vnd
no tahß Paſẜaules nhe apghanitu paghlabboyahß.

Vocem Iucund.
Joh. 16.
JEſus ẜatziya vs ẜaweem Mahzekleem: Pattees/ pattees
es ẜacku jums/ ja juhß tam Tähwam ko luhxeeta
eekſchan mannu Wahrdu/
tad tas to jums dohß.
Jhß ſchim̃Jhßſchim̃ nhe eſẜeeta juhß
nheneeka luhguſchi eekſchan
mannu Wahrdu.
Luhdſeeta/ tad juhß jemſẜeeta/
ka juhſẜa liexmiba
pillniga warr buht. Scho
äßmu es jums czaur ẜackameem
Wahrdeem runnayis/ bett tas Laix nahk/ ka es
wairs zaur ẜackameem Wahrdeem ar jums nhe runnaſchu/
bett jums ſkaidre paſluddenaſchu no ẜawu Tähwu.
Tanny paſſchà Deenà juhß luhkſẜeeta eekſchan mannu
Wahrdu/ vnd es nhe ẜacku jums/ ka es to Tähwu juhſẜo
dehl luhkt ghribbu/ Aiſto tas Tähws patz juhß mylo/ tapehtz/
ka juhß mann myloyeeta/ vnnd titzaht/ ka es no
Deewu ißghayis äßmu. Es äßmu no Tähwu ißghayis/
vnnd nahzis eekſchan ſchahß Paſẜaules/ attkal attſtahyu
es to Paſẜaul/ vnnd eemu py Tähwu. Winja
Mahzekli ẜacka vs to: Reds/ nu runna tu ſkaidre/ vnnd
nhe ẜacki nhe kahdu ẜackamu=wahrdu. Nu ſinnam
mehß/ ka tu wiſẜas leetas ſinni/ vnd nhe gir wayagg/ ka
töw kaßlabban jautha/ tapehtz titzam mehß/ ka tu no
Deewu ißghayis eſẜi.
Epiſtel am Tage der Himmelfahrt CHriſti/
Actorum 1. Cap.
PJrrmayà Ghramatà äßmu es/ mylais Theowile/ runnayis
no wiſẜu to/ ko JEſus eeẜahka darriet vnd mahziet/
ihß tai Deeny/ kad tas vsjämbtz tappa. Pehtz to
kad tas teem Apuſtuļeem (kattrus tas ißraudſiyees by) zaur
to ſwähtu Gharru pawehleyis by/ kattreem tas pehtz ẜawas
zeeſchanas dſiews paradiyees by/ zaur daſchadu Paradiſchanu/
vnd lickahß redſetees par Tſchettre deßmittahm Deenahm/
vnd runnaya ar teem no Deewa Wallſtibas.
Vnd kad tas tohß ẜapullzeyis by/ pahwehleya tas teem/
teem nhe by no Jeruſalemes attſtaht/ bett ghaidiet vs to
Ꞩohliſchanu ta Tähwa/ kattru juhß (ẜatziya tas) no mann
dſirrdeyuſchi eſẜeeta. Aiſto Jahnis gir ar Vhdeni Chriſtiyis/
bett jums buhß ar tu Ꞩwähtu Gharru chriſtiteem tapt/ nhe
illge pehtz ſchahm Deenahm.
Bett tee kattri kohpa ẜaghayuſẜchi by/ jautaya tam/ vnd
ẜatziya: Kungs ghribbi tu ſchinny laikà attkall vstaiſẜieth to
Wallſtibu Jſraela? Bett tas ẜatziya vs teem/ jums nhe peedärr
ſinnaht to laiku/ neds ſtundu/ kattru tas Tähws ẜawà
ſpähkà patturreyees gir. Bett juhß to ſpähku ta Ꞩwähta
Gharra dabbuiſẜeeta/ katters vs jums nahx/ vnnd buhſẜeeta
manni Leezineeki eekſchan Jeruſalemes/ vnnd eekſchan wiſẜu
Juddo Semm/ vnd Samaria/ vnd ihß Paſẜaules ghallam.
Vnd kad tas to ẜatziyis by/ tappa tas vsjämbtz Atziemrädſoht/
vnnd weena Paddebbes ẜajehme to aukſcham preekſchan
winjo Atzeem. Vnnd kad tee tam pehtz ſkattiyahß vs
Däbbäſẜu brautzoht/ Reds/ tad ſtahweya py teem diwi
Wyeri/ ar balltahm drehbehm/ kattri arridſan ẜatziya: Juhß
Wieri no Galilea/ ko ſtahweeta juhß/ vnd ſkattaitees vs Däbbäſẜu?
Schiß JEſus/ katters no jums gir vsjämbtz eekſchan
Däbbäſẜu/ tahß nahx/ ihten ka juhß to eſẜeeta redſeyuſſchi vs
Däbbäſẜu brautzam.
Evangelium am Himmelfahrts Tage
CHriſti/ Marci 16 Cap.
WJß pehdige/ kad tee weenpaddeßmitti (Mahzekli)
py Ghalldu ſehdeya/ paradiyahß JEſus/ vnnd
lammaya winjo Nhetitzibu/
vnd winjo Ꞩirrds zeetumu/
ka tee nhe by titzeyuſſchi
teem/ kattri to by
redſeyuſſchi/ attkall aukſcham
zähluſſchu. Vnnd
ẜatziya vs teem: Eitha pa
wiſẜu Paſẜaul/ vnnd mahzaita
to Ewangelium wiſẜai
radditai leetai. Kas titz/ vnnd Chriſtietz tohp/ tas
taps ſwähtz/ bett kas nhe titz/ tas taps paſuddis.
Bett tahß Siemes/ kattras pehtz nahx/ teems kattri
titz/ gir ſche: Mannà Wahrdà tee Wällus ißdſieß/ ar
jaunahm Mehlehm runnahß/ Tſchuhßkas nodſieß/ vnd
kad tee ko nahwige dſerrß/ tas teem nhe kaitehß. Vs
teem Nheweſẜeleem tee tahß Rohkas vslix/ tad buhß ar
teem labbahk.
Vnd tas Kungs/ pehtz tho/ kad tas ar teem runayis
by/ tappa tas vsjämbtz eekchan Däbbäſẜu/ vnd ſehd py
Deewa labbu Rohku. Bett tee (Mahzekli) ißghaya
vnd mahziya wiſẜohß mallohß. Vnnd tas Kungs palliedſeya
teem/ vnd apſtipprenaya to Wahrdu zaur pehtz=
nahkammeem Siemehm.
Epiſtel am Sontage nach der Himmelfahrt
CHriſti/ genant
Exaudi,
1. Petr. 4.
MYļi Brahļi/ eſẜeeta ghaddigi vnd mohdrigi py Pahtareem.
Bett par wiſẜahm leetahm/ myļoyeetees weens
ohtru Vggunige. Aiſto tha Myläſtiba apkla irr to
Ghräko kohpu. Mahyoyeeta weens ohtru bes Kurrneſchanas/
vnd kallpoyeeta weens ohtram ickweens ar to dahwanu
kattru tas dabbuyis gir/ ka tee labbi Nammaturretayi tahß
daſchadas Deewa ſchälaſtibas. Kad kaßlabba runna/ tad
buhß tam to runnaht/ ka Deewa Wahrdu/ Gir kamlabba
kahds Ammatz/ ka tas to darra aran to Ꞩpähku kattru
Deews dohd/ ka eekſchan wiſẜahm leetahm Deews ſlawätz
tohp/ zaur JEſum CHriſtum/ kattram gir Ghohds vnnd
Ꞩpähx muhſchige muhſcham/ Amen.
Evangelium am Sontage nach der Him-
melfahrt CHriſti/ genant
Exaudi,
Joh. 15. vnd 16.
JEſus ẜatziya vs ẜaweem
Mahzekleem:
Kad tas Eepreezetays
nahx/ kattru es jums ẜuhtiſchu
no Tähwu/ tas Gharrs
tahß Taißnibas/ katters no
Tähwu iß=eet/ tas dohß leezibu
no mann. Vnd juhß
arridſan dohſẜeeta leezibu/ Aiſto juhß eſẜeeta no Eeẜakummu
py mann biyuſſchi.
To äßmu es jums ẜatziyis/ ka juhs nhe apghräkoyeetees/
Tee jums no thaß draudſibas ißſlähx/ bett tas
laix nahk/ ka tas/ kas jums nokauß/ ſkitties/ ka tas Deewam
ar to kallpoyohtz. Vnnd to tee jums tapehtz darrieß/
ka tee neds mannu Tähwu/ neds mann attſieſt.
Bett ſcho äſmu es jums runnayis/ Aiſto/ kad tas laix
nahk/ ka juhß to peeminnaht/ ka es to jums ẜatziyis äßmu.
Bett ſcho nhe äßmu es jums no eeẜakummu ẜatziyis/
Aiſto es biyu py jums.
Epiſtel am heiligen Pfingſttage/
Actorum 2. Cap.
VNd kad tahß peetzdeßmitz Deenas peepillditas by/ by
tee Mahzekļi weenliedſige kohpa. Vnd turr notickahß
peepehſch weena Ruhkſchana no Däbbäſẜu/ ihten ka
kahds leels Wehſch/ vnd peepilldiya wiſẜu to Nammu/ kur tee
ẜehdeya. Vnd tappa rädſätas py teems dallitas Mehles/ ihtẽ
ka buhtu tahß vggunigas. Vnd wings ẜehdeyahß vs ick=kattru
ſtarrban teem/ vnd wiſẜi tappa pilli no to Ꞩwähtu Gharru.
Vnd eeẜahka mahziet ar daſchadahm Mehlehm/ ta/ ka
teem tas Gharrs dewe ißrunnaht. Bett Juddi dſiewoya eekſchan
Jeruſalemes/ tee by Deewabiyatayi Wieri no wiſẜenahdeem
Ļaudeem/ kattri appackſchan Däbbäſẜu gir. Kad
nu ẜchy Walloda ißpaude/ nahze ta Draudſe kohpa/ vnd ẜayucka/
aiſto ick=kattris dſirrdeya tohß ar ẜawu Wallodu runnayoſchus.
Bett tee iſẜatruhzenayahß wiſẜi/ vnd iſẜabrienoyahß/
vnd ẜatziya ẜawà ſtarrpà: Redſeeta/ negh gir ẜche wiſẜi/ kattri
teitan runna/ no Galilea? Ka dſirrdam mehß tad ick=kattris
ẜawu Mehl/ eekſchan kattras mehß äſẜam dſimmuſchi/
Partheri/ vnd Meederi/ vnd Elamiteri/ vnd kattri mehß
dſiewoyam eekſchan Meſopotamia/ vnd eekſchan Judea vnd
Cappadocia/ Ponto vnd Aſia/ Wrygia/ vnd Pamwilia/
Ägyptes/ vnd py teem Eſcheem to Lybiero/ py Kyrenes/ vnd
ſweſſcha tauta no Romes/ Juddi vnd Juddiļaudis/ Kreeteri
vnd Araberi/ mehß dſirrdam tohß ar muhſẜahm Mehlehm
tohß leelus Deewa darrbus runnayoſchus. Tee iſẜatruhzenayahß
wiſẜi/ vnd brienoyahß/ vnd ẜatziya weens vs ohtru/ kas
ghribb tas buht? Bett zitti mehdidami ẜatziya/ tee gir no ẜalldu
Wienu peedſäruẜches.
Evangelium am heiligen Pfingſtag/
Johann. 14. Cap.
JEſus ẜatziya vs Judda Lebbeo/ vnd teem zittem
Mahzekleem: Kas man myļo/ taß mannu Wahrdu
turrehß/ vnd manns Tähws to myļohß/ vnd mehs
py to nahxim/ vnd Mahyaweetu py to darrieſẜim. Bett
kaß mann nhe myļo/ tas nhe turr mannu Wahrdu. Vnd
taß Wahrds/ kattru juhß dſirrdaht/ nhe gir manns/ bett
ta Tähwa/ katters mann ẜuhtiyis gir.
To äßmu es yums runnayis/
teekams es py jums
äßmu biyis. Bett tas Epreezenatais/
tas Swähtz
Gharrs/ kattru manns
Tähws ẜuhtieß eekſchan
mannu Wahrdu/ tas patz
jums wiſẜas leetas mahzieß/
vnd jums attminnehß
wiſẜu to/ ko es jums ẜatziyis äßmu.
To Meeru atſtahyu es jums/ mannu Meeru dohmu
es jums/ nhe ka ta Paſẜaule dohd/ dohmu es jums.
Juhſẜai Ꞩirrdei nhe buhß ißtruhzenateeß/ vnd nhe bieteeß.
Juhß eſẜeeta dſirrdeyuſchi/ ka es jums ẜatziyis äßmu/
Es no=eemu vnd atteemu attkal py jums. Kad juhß

ka es ẜatziyis äßmu/ Es eemu py Tähwu/ aiſto tas
Tähws gir leelahx nheka es. Vnd nu äßmu es jums to
ſatziyis/ pirrms tas noteek/ Aiſto kad tas nu notix/ ka

attſieſt/ ka es to Tähwu myļoyu/ vnd ka es ta darru/ ka
mann tas Tähws pawehleyis gir.

tis/ Rom. 8.
MYļi Brahļi/ Es titzu/ ka ſchie laiziga zeeſchana nhe attmaxa
to Ghohdibu/ kattru mums redſige dabbuit buhß.
Aiſto tahß mohkas vnd bähdas to raddito leeto/ ghaida
vs to Apſkaidroſchanu to Deewa Bährno/ tapehtz ka ta
Raddiba padohta gir tai welltigai leeti/ bes ẜawas ghribbeſchanas/
bett ta dehl kas to padehwis gir/ vs zerribu. Aiſto
irr ta Raddiba taps attpeſtita no tahß Kallpoſchanas tahß
ißniekamas leetas vs to ghohdigu Ꞩwabbadibu to Deewa
Bährno. Aiſto mehß ſinnam/ ka wiſẜa Raddiba ar mums
ghaida vnd nopuhſchahß ẜöw wehl allaſchien. Vnd nhe ween
tee/ bett mehß paſſchi arridſan/ kattreem gir ta Gharra
Pirrmiba/ vnd ghaidam arridſan py mums paſſcheem pehtz
to Behrnibu/ vnnd ghaidam to Attpeſtiſchanu muhſẜas
Meeſẜas.
Evangelium am vierden Sontage nach
Trinitatis/ Luc. 6.
JEſus ẜatziya vs ẜaweem Mahzekleem/ Eſẜeeta ſchehligi/
ihten ka juhſẜo Tähws ſchehliegs gir/ Nhe ẜohdaita/
tad nhe tapſẜeeta juhß ẜohditi. Nhe paſudenayeeta/
tad nhe tapſẜeeta juhß paſudenati/ Peedohdeeta/
tad taps jums peedohtz. Dohdeeta/ tad taps jums dohtz.
Weens pills/ ẜaſpaidietz vnnd attleekams Mährs taps
jums juhſẜa Klehpy ee=dohtz. Aiſto ar to Mähru/ ar kattru
juhß ißmehŗohſẜeeta/ taps jums attkal ee=mehŗohtz.
Vnd wings ẜatziya teem
weenu Liedſibu/ Warrieg
Acklis Acklam zeļļu rahdiet?
Negg kriet tee abbidiwi
Beddreh? Tas Mahzeklis
nhe gir auxtahx ka
Meiſters/ kad tas Mahzeklis
gir ka winja Meiſters/
tad gir tas par pillu. Bett
ko reds tu weenu Skabbarrgu tawa Brahļa Atzy/ vnd
to Balgki tawà paſſchà Atzy tu nhe nomani? Jeb ka
warri tu ẜatziet vs ẜawu Brahli: Zeet Brahli/ es ghribbu
to Skabbarrgu no tawu Atzi ißwillckt/ vnnd tu
patz nhe redſi to Balgki ẜawà Atzy? Tu blehdneex weltz
papreekſch to Balgki no tawas Atz/ vnnd peeluhko
tad/ ka tu to Skabbarrgu no tawa Brahļa Atzi ißwillckt
warrätu.
Epiſtel am fünfften Sontage nach Trinita-
tis/ 1. Pet. 3.
MYļi Brahļi/ eſẜeeta wiſẜinotaļ weenà prahtà/ lieds zeeßdami/
Brahligi/ ſchälẜirrdigi/ laipni. Nhe attmaxayeeta
ļaun ar ļaun/ neds Lahſtus ar Lahſteem/ bett
tur prettie ſwehtiyeeta/ vnnd ſinnaita/ ka juhß tapehtz aitzenahti
eſẜeeta/ ka jums to ſwähtumu manntoht buhß. Aiſto
kas dſiewoht ghribb/ vnd labbas Deenas redſeht/ tas laid
turr ẜawu Mehl/ ka ta ļaun nhe runna/ vnd ẜawas Luhpas/
ka tee nhe peewiļļ. Tas attwehrſchahß no ļaunu/ vnd laid
labbe darra. Tas laid meckleh to Meeru/ vnd dſännahß tai
pehtz. Aiſto tahß Atzis tha Kunga ſkattahß vs teem Taißneem/
vnnd winja Auſẜis vs to (Taißno) Luhkſchanu. Bett
tas Waigs ta Kunga räds vs teem/ kattri ļaun darra.
Vnd kurrſch gir/ kas jums ļaun darriet warr/ kad juhß
pehtz to labbumu dſännatees? Vnnd jeb juhß arridſan zeeſchaht
tahß Taißnibas dehl/ tad eſẜeta juhß tomähr ſwähti.
Bett nhe iſẜabyeſtatees par winjo Leeliſchanu/ vnnd nhe ißtruhzenayeetees/
bett ſwehtiyeeta Deewam tam Kungam
juhſẜahß Ꞩirrdies.
Evangelium am fünfften Sontage nach
Trinitatis/ Luc. 5.
TAs notickahß/ ka tee Ļaudis py to Kungu JEſum
ſpeedehß/ Deewa Wahrdu dſirrdeht. Vnd wings
ſtahweya py to Äſäru Genezareth/
vnd redſeya diwi
Laiwas py to Äſäru ſtahwoſchas/
bett tee Sweineeki
by ißkahpuſſchi/ vnd
maſghaya ẜawus Tieklus/
Kahpe tas weenà laiwà/
kattra Simoņam peederreya/
vnnd luhdſe tam/ ka
tas to magkeniet no Mallas nozälltu/ vnd tas paſẜedeyahß/
vnnd mahziya tohß Ļaudis no to Laiwu.
Vnd kad tas beidſe runnaht/ ẜatziya tas vs Simoni/
dohdees vs auxtu/ vnd ißmetteeta juhſẜus Tieklus/ ka
juhß weenu Lohmu wällkaht. Vnd Simons adbilldeya/
vnd ẜatziya vs to: Meiſteri/ mehß äſẜam zauru Nackti
ſtradayuſſchi/ vnd nheneeka dabbuyuſſchi/ bett vs tawu
Wahrdu ghribbu es to Tieklu ißmeſt. Vnnd kad tee to
darriya/ apwillka tee leelu Kohpu Siwyu/ vnnd winjo
Tieklis ẜapplieſẜa. Vnnd tee aitzenaya ẜawus Beedrus/
kattri ohtrà Laiwà by/ ka tee nahktu/ vnd palliedſähtu
teem willckt. Vnnd tee nahze/ vnd peepilldiya abbas
Laiwas pillus/ tha/ ka tee ghrimma. Kad to Simons
Peteris redſeya/ kritte tas JEſu apkahrt zeļļeems/ vnd
ẜatziya/ Kungs/ ey no mann aran/ es äßmu weens
ghrehziegs Zillwähx/ aiſto tam by Jſẜabieſchana vsghayuſẜi/
vnd wiſẜeem kattri ar to by par ſcho Lohmu/ kattru
tee willkuſchi by/ Ta lieds arridſan Jäcobam vnnd Jaņam
teem Dähleem Zebedei/ Simona Beedreem. Vnd
JEſus ẜatziya vs Simoni/ Nhe iſẜabieſtees/ Aiſto no
ſcho laiku/ buhß töw Zillwäkus ſweyoht. Vnnd winji
willka tahß Laiwas py mallas/ vnnd attſtahya wiſẜas
leetas/ vnd ſtaighaya tam pehtz.
Epiſtel am ſechſten Sontage nach Trinita-
tis/ Rom. 6.
MJeļi Brahļi/ nhe ſinnaht juhß/ ka wiſẜi/ kattri mehß
eekſchan JEſum CHriſtum Chriſtiti äſẜam/ tee äſẜam
mehß eekſchan winja Nahwu CHriſtiti. Tad äſẜam
mehß nu ar to aprackti zaur to Chriſtibu eekſchan to Nahwu/
Aiſto ihten ka Chriſtus vsmohdenahtz gir no teem Mirroņeem/
zaur to Ghohdibu ta Tähwa/ ta buhß mums arridſan
eekſchan jaunu Dſiewoſchanu ſtaighaht. Bett ka mehß nu
ar to eeſtadieti tohpam eekſchan liedſigas Nahwes/ tad buhß
mums arridſan tai Aukſcham zellſchanai liedſeem buht/ pehtz
to/ ka mehß ſinnam/ ka muhſẜo wätz Zillwähx ar to krußtà
ẜiſtz gir/ ka ta ghreziga Meeſẜa mitteyahß/ ka mehß nu joproyam
teem Ghräkeem wairs nhe Kallpoyam. Aiſto kas
nomirris gir/ tas gir taißnohtz no Ghräkeem. Bett äſẜam
mehß ar CHriſto mirruſchi/ tad titzam mehß/ ka mehß arridſan
ar to dſiewohſẜim/ vnd ſinnam/ ka CHriſtus no teem
mirroņeem vsmohdenahtz/ nu wairs nhe mirrſt/ ta Nahwe
joproyam wairahk par to nhe walldieß/ Aiſto ko tas mirris
gir/ to gir tas to Ghräko dehl mirris ween reis/ bett ko tas
dſiewos/ to dẜiewa tas Deewam. Ta juhß arridſan/ turraitees
jums par tahdeem/ ka juhß no teem Ghräkeem nomirruſchi
eſẜeeta/ vnnd Deewam dſiewoyeeta/ eekſchan JEſu CHriſto
muhſẜu Kungu.
Evangelium am ſechſten Sontage nach Tri-
nitatis/ Matth. 5.
JEſus ẜatziya vs teem Ļaudeem vnnd vs ẜaweem
Mahzekleem: Es ẜacku jums/ ja juhſẜa Taißniba
nhe gir labbaka ka to Raxtamahzetayo vñ Wariſeeŗo/ tad
juhß eekſchan tahß Däbbäſẜo=wallſtibasDäbDäb-böſẜo=wallſtibas
nhe nahxeeta.
Juhß eſẜeta dſirrdeyuſchi/
ka teem Wätzakeem ẜatzietz
gir/ Töw nhe buhß Nokaut.
Bett kas Nokaw/ tas
buhß to Ꞩohdibu nopelniyis.
Bett es ſacku jums/
kas ar ẜawu Brahli dußmo/
tas gir to Ꞩohdibu nopellniyis/ bett kas vs ẜawu
Brahli ẜacka/ Racha/ tas gir tahß Runnas nopellniyis.
Bett kas ẜacka/ tu Jegkis/ tas gir to Elles Vgguni
nopellniyis.
Tapehtz kad tu tawu Dahwanu vs to Alltari vppere/
vnd tu ee=ghadayees/ ka töw ar tawu Brahli kas
ja=darra/ tad attſtah turr preekſchan to Alltari tawu
dahwanu/ vnd noey pirrmahk/ vnd ẜadderrees ar tawu
Brahli/ vnd nahtz tad/ vnnd vppere tawu Dahwanu.
Eſẜi labprahtiegs tawam Prettibneekam dries/ teekams
tu wehl py to wirß zeļļu eſẜi/ ka töw tas Prettibneex
weenreis nhe nodohd tam Ꞩohgam/ vnd tas Ꞩohgis
nodohd töw tam Ꞩullaiņam/ vnnd tu tohpi zetumà
eemäſtz. Es ẜacku töw pattees/ tu no turrenes nhe iß=
eeſẜi/ pirrms tu to pehdigu Kauſẜu maxahſẜi.
Epiſtel am ſiebenden Sontage nach Trini-
tatis/ Rom. 6. Cap.
MYeļi/ Brahļi/ mann buhß pehtz Zillwehzigu dabbu runnaht/
tapehtz ka juhſẜa Meeſẜa wahya gir. Jhten ka juhß
juhſẜus Lohzeklus paddäwuſchi eſẜeeta par Kallpoſchanu
tahß Nheſkieſtibas/ vnd no weenas Nhetaißnibas vs ohtras:
Ta padohdeeta nu arridſan juhſẜus Lohzeklus py Kallpoſchanas
tai Taißnibai/ ka tee ſwähti tohp. Aiſto kad juhß
to Ghräko Kallpi biyaht/ tad biyaht juhß ẜwabbadi no tahß
Taißnibas/ kahdus augļusagļus juhß to briedi dabbuyaht/ par
kattreem juhß nu kaunahtees? Aiſto tas ghalls to paſſcho
gir ta Nahwe. Bett ka juhß nu no teem Ghräkeem ẜwabbadi
eſẜeeta/ vnnd Deewa Kallpi tappuſchi/ gir jums juhſẜi augļi/
ka juhß ẜwähti tohpaht/ bett tas ghalls gir ta muhſchiga
dſiewoſchana: Aiſto ta Nahwe gir to Ghräko Allga/ bett
tas Deewa Dahwans gir ta muhſchiga dſiewoſchana eekſchan
CHriſto JEſu muhſẜu Kungu.
Evangelium am ſiebenden Sontage nach
Trinitatis/ Marc. 8.
TAnny laikà/ kad turr dauds Ļaudis by/ vnd teem
nhe by ja=ähd/ peeẜautze JEſus ẜawus Mahzekļus
py ẜöw/ vnnd ẜatziya vs
teem/ Mann gir tick ſchähl
to Ļauſcho/ Aiſto tee gir nu
tries Deenas py mann pallickuſchi/
vnd teem nhe gir
nhe neeka ja=ähd. Vnd ja
es tohß nheähduſchus no
mann attlaiſtu/ tad tee vs
zeļļu baddu nomirrtu/ Aiſto
zitti by no tahlenes attnahkuſchi.
Winja Mahzekļi adbilldeya tam/ kur jämmam
mehß ſcheitan Maiſes Tuxneſẜy/ ka mehß tohß pee=ähdenayam?
Vnd wings jautaya teem: Zeek Maiſes gir
jums? Tee ẜatziya Ꞩeptingi. Vnd wings pawehleya
teem Ļaudeem/ ka teem ẜöw wirſẜon Semmes paſẜehſt
by. Vnnd wings jehme tahß ẜeptingas Maiſes/ vnd
patteitze/ vnd pahrlauſe tahß/ vnnd dewe tahß ẜaweem
Mahzekleem/ ka tee tahß paſſchas preekſcha zälltu/ vnd
tee zehle tahß teem Ļaudeem preekſcha. Vnnd teem by
magkeniet Siwitingi/ vnd wings patteitze/ vnd pawehleya
tohß paſſchus arridſan preekſcha neſt. Bett tee
ehde/ vnnd pee=ehde/ vnd ẜalaſẜiya tahß attlickuſchas
Druſkas/ ẜeptingus Kurrwus/ vnnd to by py tſchettri=
tuxtoſchi/ kattri turr ähduſchi by. Vnd wings attlaide
tohß no ẜöw.
Epiſtel am achten Sontage nach Trinita-
tis/ Rom. 8.
MJeļi Brahļi/ Mehß äſẜam Parradneeki/ nhe tahß Meeſẜas/
ka mums pehtz to Meeſẜu dſiewoht buhß/ aiſto ja
juhß pehtz to Meeſẜu dſiewohſẜeeta/ tad juhß mirrſẜeeta.
Bett ja juhß zaur to Gharru tahß Meeſẜas darrbu ſlahpehſẜeeta/
tad juhß dſiewohſẜeeta. Aiſto kattrus tas Deewa
Gharrs dſänn/ tee gir Deewa Bährni. Aiſto juhß nhe eſẜeeta
kahdu Kallpa Gharru dabbuyuſchi/ ka jums attkal ja=bieſtahß/
bett juhß eſẜeeta weenu Bährna Gharru dabbuyuſchi/
zaur kattru mehß ẜautzam/ Abba/ mieļais Tähws. Tas patz
Gharrs dohd muhſẜam Gharram leezibu/ ka mehß Deewa
Bährni äſẜam. Äſẜam mehß tad Bährni/ tad äſẜam mehß
arridſan Mannteneeki/ ar wahrdu/ Deewa Mannteneeki/
vnd Lieds=mannteneeki CHriſti/ ja mehß tickai liedſe zeetieſẜim/
ka mehß arridſan liedſe py Ghohdibas pa=auxtenati
tohpam.
Evangelium am achten Sontage nach Tri-
nitatis/ Matth. 7.
JEſus ẜatziya vs teem Ļaudeem vnnd vs ẜaweem
Mahzekļeem/ ẜarrghayeetees par teem willtigeem
Proweeteem/ kattri Awya drehbehß py jums nahk/ bett
no eekſchanas gir tee plehſẜigi Willki. Py winja augļeem
buhß jums tohß atſiet. Warrieg arridſan kaßlabban
Wiena=ohgus laſẜiet no teem Ehrſcheem? Jeb Wieges
no teem dadſcheem? Aiſto ickkattris labbs kohx
näß labbus Augļus/ bett weens ẜappuwis kohx näß
nicknus augļus. Weens
labbs kohx nhe warr nicknus
augļus neſt/ vñ weens
ẜappuwis kohx nhe warr
labbus augļus neſt. Jck
kattris kohx/ katters labbus
augļus nhe näß/ tohp
nozirrſts/ vnd Vgguny ee=
mäſts. Tapehtz py winja
augļeem buhß jums tohß attſiet. Nhe wiſẜi tee/ kattri
vs mann ẜacka/ Kungs/ Kungs/ eekſchan Däbbäſẜo=
wallſtibas nahx/ bett tee/ kattri to darra/ ko manns
Tähws Debbeſẜies ghribb Dauds vs mann ẜatzies
winjà Deenà/ Kungs/ Kungs/ nhe äſẜam mehß tawà
Wahrdà nahkoſchas leetas papreekſch ẜatziyuſchi? Nhe
äſẜam mehß tawà Wahrdà Wällus ißdſinnuſchi? Nhe
äſẜam mehß tawà Wahrdà dauds darrbus darriyuſchi?
Tad es vs teem ẜatzieſchu: Es nhe äßmu juhß wehl
muhſcham atſinnis/ Attkahpeeteeß no mann wiſẜi juhß
Ļaundarritayi.
Epiſtel am neundten Sontage nach Trinita-
tatis
1. Corinth 10.
MJeļi Brahļi/ Nhe tohpeeta Ällkadeewa Kallpi/ ihten
ka zitti no winjeem tappa/ ka turr raxtietz ſtahw: Tee
Ļaudis paẜehdeyahß py Ehſchanas vnd dſerrſchanas/
vnd zehlehß aukſcham meeßlohtes. Nhe laideeta mums arridſan
nhe kahdu Mauzibu dſieth/ ka zitti no winjeem Mauzibu
dſinna/ vnd kritta weenà Deenà diwideßmitti/ vnd tries
tuhxtoſchi. Bett nhe laideeta mums arridſan Chriſtum kahrdenaht/
kazitti no teem to kahrdenaya/ vnd tappa no teem
Ohdſehm nomährdäti. Nhe kurrneyeeta arridſan/ lieds ka
zitti no teems kurrneya/ vnd tappa nomahkti no to nomährdätayu.
Schiß noticka wiß winjeem par Preekſchſiem/ bett tas
gir raxtietz mums par Attghadaſchanu/ vs kattreem tas ghalls
tahß Paſẜaules nahzis gir. Tapehtz kas ſkeetahß/ wings ſtahwohtz/
tas warr labb peeluhkoht/ ka tas nhe krieth. Wehl
jums nhe kahda ka ween zillwehziga Kahrdenaſchana pahr
ghayuſẜi gir. Bett Deews gir peetitziegs/ katters juhß nheleek
kahrdenaht par juhſẜu ſpähku/ bett darra tha/ ka ta kahrdenaſchana
tahdu ghallu jämm/ ka juhß to warreeta paneſt.
Tapehtz manni myeļi/ behdſeeta no to ällkadeewigu buhſchanu.
Evangelium am neundten Sontage nach
Trinitatis/ Luc. 16
JEſus ẜatziya vs ẜaweem Mahzekleem: Turr by weens
baggahtz Wiers/ tam by weens Nammaturrätays/
tas tappa preekſchan winju
aprunnahtz/ ka buhtu
tas tam winja Manntu ißpohſtiyis.
Vnd wings aitzenaya
to/ vnd ẜatziya vs
to: Ko dſirrſchu es no töw?
Dohd laghadibu no tawas
Nammaturreſchanas/
Aiſto tu nhe warri nu
joproyam weens Nammaturrätais wairs buht. Tas
Nammaturrätais runnaya py ẜöw paſſcham/ ko buhß
mann darrieth? Manns Kungs jämm to Nammaturreſchanu
no mann. Rackt mann nhe ghribbahß/ es kaunohß
arridſan deedeleht. Es ghann ſinnu/ ko es ghribbu
darrieth/ kad es no to Ammatu nozälltz tohpu/ ka tee
mann ẜawahß Nammahß ee=jämm.
Vnnd tas aitzenaya py ẜöw wiſẜus Paraddneekus
ẜawa Kunga/ vnd ẜatziya vs to pirrmo: Zeek eſẜi tu mannam
Kungam parradà? Wings ẜatziya: Ꞩimbt Muttzus
Olye. Vnnd tas ẜatziya vs winju: Jemm tawu
Ghramatu/ ẜehdees/ vnnd raxti tudeļļ peezedeßmitz.
Pehtz to ẜatziya tas vs to Ohtru: Bett tu/ zeek dauds
eſẜi tu parradà? Wings ẜatziya: Ꞩimbts mähru Queſcho.
Vnnd tas ẜatziya vs winju: Jemm tawu Ghramatu/
vnd raxti aſton=deßmitz. Vnnd tas Kungs teitze
to nhetaißnu Nammaturrätayu/ ka tas ghuddrige darriyis
by. Aiſto tee bährni ſchahß Paſẜaules gir ghuddraki/
nhe ka tee Bährni tahß Ghaiſſchumas/ eekſchan
ẜawu Raddu. Vnnd es ẜacku jums arridſan/ darraita
jums arridſan Draugus ar to nhetaißnu manntu/ ka
tad kad jums peetruhxt/ tee juhß vsjämm eekſchan to
muhſchigu Dſiewohklu.
Epiſtel am zehenden Sontage nach Trinita-
tis/ 1. Corinth. 12.
MJeļi Brahļi/ no teem Gharrigheem dahwaneem nhe
ghribbu es jums paſlehpt. Juhß ſinnaht/ ka juhß Paggani
eſẜeeta biyuſchi/ vnnd noghayuſchi py teem mähmeem
Ällkadeeweem/ ka juhß tad wäſti tappaht. Tapehtz
buhß jums ſinnaht/ ka nhe weens JEſum nolahd/ katters
zaur to Deewa Gharru runna. Vnd nhe weens nhe warr
JEſum parr Kungu ẜauckt/ ka ween zaur to ſwätuſwàtu Gharru.
Tur gir daſchadi Dahwani/ bett tur gir weens Gharrs/
vnd tur gir daſchadi Ammati/ bett tur gir weens Kungs/ vnd
tur gir daſchada Spehziba/ bett tur gir weens Deews katters
ſtrahda wiſẜas leetas eekſchan wiſẜeem. Eekſchan ick=kattru
parahdahß ẜöw tahß dahwanas tha Gharra/ par labbu tai
draudſei. Zittam tohp dohta zaur to Gharru ta Runnaſchana
(Walloda/) no tahß Ghuddribas. Zittam tohp dohta
ta Runnaſchana no tahß Atſiſchanas pehtz to paſſchu
Gharru/ zittam ta Titziba eekſchan to paſſchu Gharru/ zittam
ta dahwana Wäſẜälu darriet eekſchan to paſſchu Gharru/
zittam Brienumus darriet/ zittam Mahziſchana/ zittam
Gharrus Jßpraſt/ zittam daſchada Mehle/ zittam tahß mehles
Jß=ſtahſtiet. Bett ſcho wiſẜu darra tas patz weeniegs
Gharrs/ vnd ißdalla ickweenam to Dahwanu ka tam pattiek.
Evangelium am zehenden Sontage nach
Trinitatis/ Luc. 19.
KAd JEſus tuwe klaht
py Jeruſalemes nahze/
vsluhkoya tas to Pili/
vnd raudaya par to/ vnnd
ẜatziya/ Kad tu to ſinnatu/

wayadſätu. Bett nu gir

Bährneem ar töw/ weenu Rattapili apkahrt töw
ẜittieß/ töw apẜehdehß/ vnnd wiſẜahß mallahß ſpaidieß/

Epiſtel am eilfften Sontage nach Trinita-
tis/ 1. Corinth. 15.
MYeļi Brahļi/ es attminnu jums to Ewangelium/ ko es
jums paſluddenayis äßmu/ kattru juhß arridſan vsjämuſchi
eſẜeeta/ eekſchan kattru juhß arridſan ſtahweeta/
zaur kattru juhß arridſan ẜwähti tohpeeta/ ka es jums to
paſluddenayis äßmu/ ja juhß tickai to patturreyuſchi eſẜeeta/
tas warr tad buht/ ka juhß wellte buhtat titzeyuſchi. Aiſto es
äßmu jums papreekſch to dewis/ kattru es arridſan dabbuyis
äßmu/ ka CHriſtus nomirris gir muhſẜo Ghräko dehl/ pehtz
to Raxtu/ vnd ka tas apracktz gir/ vnd ka tas attkall aukſcham
zehleeß gir/ treſſchà Deenà/ pehtz to Raxtu. Vnd ka
tas gir rädſähtz no Keewas/ pehtz no teem Diwipaddeßmitteem.
Pehtz gir tas rädſähtz no wairahk nhe ka peezeẜimbteem
Brahleem weenà reiſa/ no teems paſſcheems wehl dauds
dſiewo/ bett zitti gir aismigguſchi. Pehtz gir tas rädſahtz no
Jacobu/ pehtz no wiſẜeem Apuſtuļeem. Wiß pehdige pehtz
wiſẜeems gir tas arridſan no man/ ka no kahdu nhelaizigu
dſimbtibu rädſähtz. Aiſto es äßmu tas ſämmakais no teem
Apuſtuļeem/ katters es nhe äßmu zeeniex/ ka mann par Apuſtuli
ẜautz/ tapehtz/ ka es to Deewa Draudſibu pullghayis

vnd winja ſchäläſtiba py mann nhe gir wellte biyuſẜi. Bett es
äßmu dauds wairahk ſtradayis/ nhe ka tee wiſẜi. Bett nhe es/
bett Deewa ſchäläſtiba/ kattra eekſchan mann gir.

JEſus ẜatziya wißwairahk vs teem/ kattri ſkittahß

tis/ 2. Corinth. 3.
MJeļi Brahļi/ tada peetitziba gir mums zaur CHriſtum
py Deewu/ nhe ta/ ka mehß ko labb därram no mums
paſſcheem kahdu leetu apdohmaht/ ihten ka no mums
paſſcheem: Bett ko mehß därram/ tas gir no Deewu katters
mums arridſan zeenigus darriyis gir/ to Ammatu tahß
jaunas Eeſtadiſchanas ſtrahdaht/ nhe ta Baußla/ bett ta
Gharra. Aiſto tas Baußlis nokaw/ bett tas Gharrs darra
dſiewus.
Bett ja tam Ammatam/ katters zaur to Baußlu nokaw/
vnd eekſchan teem Ackmiņņeem eſiemohtz gir/ ſkaidriba by/ ka
tee Bährni Jſrael nhe warreya vsluhkoht to waighu Moſi/

nhe by tad dauds wairahk tam Ammatam/ katters to Gharru
dohd/ ſkaidriba buht? Aiſto ka nu tam Ammatam/ katters
to Paſuſſchanu mahza/ ſkaidriba gir/ wehl dauds wairahk
gir tam Ammatam/ katters to Taißnibu mahza/ ſpehziga
ſkaidriba.
Evangelium am zwölfften Sontage nach
Trinitatis/ Marci 7. Cap.
KAd JEſus atkal ißghaya no tahm Eſcham Tyri
vnd Sydon/ nahze tas py to Galileero Juhri/ widdu
ſtarpan tahm Eeſchahm to deßmitto Pilo. Vnnd

jehme to no teem Ļaudeem
ẜawißke py mallas/ vnd licka

vnd iß=ſplahwe/ vnnd
aiſkare winja Mehļ vnd
ſkattiyahß vs Däbbäſẜu/

Vnnd tudeļļ attwehrehß

Ꞩwabbads/ vnd runnaya pareiſe. Vnd wings aißleedſe
