Epiſtel am dreyzehenden Sontage nach Tri-
nitatis/ Gal. 3.
MYļi Brahļi/ es ghribbu vs Zillwehzigu dabbu runnahtrunnaht=.
Nhe weens nitzina weena zillwäka Eeſtadiſchanu (kad
ta apſtipprenata gir) vnd nhe peeleek arridſan nhe neeka.
Nu gir jo ta ẜohliſchana tam Abrahamam/ vnd winja
Ꞩähklai ẜohlita. Tas nhe ẜacka/ eekſchan teem Ꞩähkleem/ ka
zaur dauds/ bett ka zaur weenu: Zaur tawu Ꞩähklu/ katters
gir CHriſtus. Bett es ẜacku no to/ ta Eeſtadiſchana kattra
no Deewu papreekſch apſtipprenata gir/ vs CHriſtum/
nhe tohp ißdſähſta/ ka tai Ꞩohliſchanai by zaur to Baußlu
miſt/ (
alij
mittehtees/) katters dohtz gir par tſchettreẜimbteems
vnd trießdeßmitteems Ghaddeems. Aiſto ja ta Bährna Mañtiba
zaur to Baußlu nopellnita taptu/ tad nhe taptu ta zaur
to Ꞩohliſchanu dohta. Bett Deews gir tam Abrahamam
to zaur to Ꞩohliſchanu wellte ee=ſkiņņkoyis. Ko buhß tad tam
Baußlam? Tas gir klaht pee=nahzis to Ghräko dehļ teekam
ka ta Ꞩähkla nahktu/ tam kattram ta Ꞩohliſchana notickuſẜi
gir/ vnd gir ißtaiſẜietz no teems Engeļeems zaur to Rohku
tha Widdetaya/ bett weens Widdetais nhe gir weena weeniga
Widdetais/ bett Deews gir weeniegs. Ka? gir tad tas
Baußlis pretty Deewa ẜohliſchanu? Tas nhe warr buht.
Bett ja kahds Baußlis buhtu dohtz/ kas warrätu dſiewus
darriet/ tad nahktu ta Taißniba pattees no to Baußlu. Bett
tas Raxtz gir wiſẜus nolitzis appackſchan teem Ghräkeem/
ka ta Ꞩohliſchana nahktu/ zaur to Titzibu eekſchan CHriſto
JEſu/ teem dohta/ kattri titz.
Evangelium am dreyzehenden Sontage
nach Trinitatis/ Luc. 10.
JEſus attghreeſehß ẜöw vs ẜaweem Mahzekleem/
vnd ẜatziya itt ihpaſſch: Swähtas gir tahß Atzis/
kattras räds/ ko juhß rädſaht. Aiſto es ẜacku jums/
dauds Proweetes vnnd Koningi ghribbeya redſeht/ ko
juhß rädſaht/ vnd nhe gir redſeyuſchi/ vnd dſirrdeht/ ko
juhß dſirrdaht/ vnd nhe gir dſirrdeyuſchi.
Vnd reds/ tad zehlehß aukſcham weens Raxtamahzetayß/
ghribbädams to ißklauſẜiet ẜatziya: Meiſteri/ ko
buhß mann darrieth/ ka es to muhſchigu Dſiewoſchanu
dabbu? Bett wings ẜatziya vs to: Ka ſtahw Baußly
raxtietz? Ka laſẜi tu? Tas adbilldeya vnd ẜatziya/ Töw
buhß Deewu tawu Kungu mieļoht/ no wiſẜas Ꞩirrds/
no wiſẜu Dwehſẜeli/ no wiſẜu Ꞩpähku/ vnnd no wiſẜu
Prahtu/ vnnd tawu Tuwaku ka ẜöw paſſchu. Bett
wings ẜatziya vs to: Tu eſẜi pareiſe adbilldeyis/ darri to/
tad tu dſiewohſẜi.
Bett tas ghribbädams
ẜöw pattz taißnohtees/ ẜatziya
vs JEſu: Kas gir tad
manns Tuwakaiß? Tad
adbilldeya JEſus vnd ẜatziya/
Turr by weens Zillwähx/
tas ißghaya no Jeruſalemes
vs Jericho/ vnd
tam ghaddiyahß ſtarrp
Släppkaweem/ tee ißwillka to/ vnd kuhle to/ vnd ghaya
nohſt/ vnd atſtahya to puß nomirruſchu ghulloſchu.
Bett tas lehzehß no nheyauſch/ ka weens Baßnizas=
kungs to paſſchu zeļļu ſtaighaya/ vnd kad tas nahze py
to weetu/ vnd redſeya to/ paghaya tas zätzen. Ta lieds
arridſan weens Leewietz/ kad tas nahze py to weetu/ vnd
redſeya to/ ghaya tas zätzen. Bett weens Samariters
ſtaighaya vnd nahze turr. Vnd kad tas to redſeya/ abſchäloyahß
tas ẜöw par to/ vnd peeghaya py to/ ẜaſẜehya
tam winja Wahtes/ vnd lehya tam eekſchan ölye vnnd
Wienu. Vnd zehle to vs ẜawu Lohpu/ vnnd wedde to
eekſchan Mahyaweetas/ vnnd ẜarrghaja to. Ohtrà
Deenà brautze tas nohſt/ vnd ißwilka diwi Ghroſſchus/
vnd dewe tohß tam Ꞩaimneekam/ vnnd ẜatziya vs to:
Ghlabba to/ vnnd ja tu ko wairahk ißdohſẜi/ ghribbu es
töw to attmaxaht att=eedammsattee=damms. Kattru ſkeetees tu/ no
ſcheems trimms to Tuwaku äſẜam biyuſchu tam/ kattram
ſtarrp Släppkaweem ghaddiyahß? Tas ẜatziya/
Tas/ katters ſchälaſtibu tam darriya. Tad ẜatziya JEſus
vs to: Tad ey prohyam/ vnd darri tha arridſan.
Epiſtel am vierzehenden Sontage nach Tri-
nitatis/ Gal. 5.
MYeļi Brahļi/ ſtaighayeeta eekſchan Gharru/ tad juhß
tahß Meſẜas kahribu nhe peepilldieſẜeeta. Aiſto tai
Meeſẜi ghribbahß prettie to Gharru/ vnd tam Gharram
prettie to Meeſẜu. Tee paſſchi gir weens prett ohtru/ ka
juhß nhe darraht/ ko juhß ghribbaht. Bett ja jums tas
Gharrs wallda/ tad nhe eſẜeta juhß appackſchan to Baußlu.
Bett tee darrbi tahß Meeſẜas gir ſinnami/ ka turr gir
Laulibas Pahrkahpſchana/ Mauziba/ nheſkieſtiba/ Beßkauniba/
Ällkadeewiba/ Burrwiba/ Eeneidiba/ Bahrſchana/ Eeniedeſchana/
Dußmiba/ Reeſchana/ Nheẜaddereſchana/ nhelabba
Mahziba/ Nhe ee=redſeſchana/ Släppkawiba/ Plieteſchana/
Ryſchana/ vnd kas ta warr buht. No kattreems es
jums papreekſch ẜatziyis äßmu/ vnd ẜacku wehl papreekſch/ ka
tee/ kattri to darra/ to Deewa Wallſtibu par Bährna manntibu
nhe dabbuis.
Bett tee augļi tha Gharra gir/ Myläſtiba/ Liexmiba/
Meers/ Pazeeſchana/ lehniba/ laipniba/ Titziba/ lähns=prahtz/
Skieſtiba/ prettie tahdeem nhe gir tas Baußlis. Bett kattri
CHriſto/ peedärr/ tee ſlahpina ẜawu Meeſẜu/ arr to Kahrumu
vnd eeghribbeſchanu.
Ewangelium am vierzehenden Sontage
nach Trinitatis/ Luc. 17.
VNd tas notickahß/ kad JEſus ghaya vs Jeruſalemes/
ſtaighaya tas widdu zaur Samaria vnnd
Galilea. Vnd kad wings
weenà Jällghawà nahze/
ẜattappa winjam deßmittz
Spittaligi Wieri/ tee ſtahweya
no tahļenes/ pazälldami
ẜawus Ballxnes ſatziya:
JEſu/ myļais Meiſteri/
abſchäloyees töw par
mums. Vnnd kad wings
tohß redſeya/ ẜatziya wings vs teem: No eyta/ vnd rahdaitees
teem Baßnizaskungeem. Vnnd tas notickahß
kad tee noghaya/ tappa tee ſkieſti.
Bett weens no teem/ rädſädams/ ka tas by wäſẜäls
tappis/ attghreeſehß tas attkal apkahrt/ vnnd teitze
Deewu/ ar ſkannigu ballxni/ vnd kritta vs ẜawu Waigu/
py winja kahyeemah/ vnd patteitze winjam. Vnnd
tas by weens Samariters. Bett JEſus adbilldeya vnd
ẜatziya/ Nhegg gir turr deßmittz ſkieſti tappuſchi? Bett
kur gir tee dehwingi? Nhe gir tad zittz nhe weens attrahſts/
katters attkal attghreeſtohß/ vnd dohtu Deewam Ghohdu/
ka weens ſchis Ꞩweſſcheneex? Vnd wings ẜatziya
vs to: zellees aukſcham/ ey prohyam/ tawa Titziba gir
töw palliedſeyuſẜi.
Epiſtel am funffzehenden Sontage nach
Trinitatis/ Gal. 6.
MYeļi Brahļi/ ja mehß eekſchan Gharru dſiewoyam/
tad laideeta mums arridſan eekſchan Gharru ſtaighaht.
Nhe laideeta mums pehtz to neezigu Ghohdu
kahrotees/ neds dußmotees muhſẜo ſtarrpà/ neds eeniedehtees.
Myļi Brahļi/ ja kahds Zillwähx no kahdas wainas
pahrſteicktz tohp/ tad palliedſeeta tam attkal ar lehnprahtigu
Gharru/ juhß kattri juhß Gharrigi eſẜeeta. Vnd luhkoyees
vs ẜöw paſſchu/ ka tu arridſan nhe tohpi kahrdenahtz. Weens
laid pannäß ohtra Naßtu/ tad juhß to Baußlu CHriſti peepilldieeſẜeta.
Bett ja kaßlabba domatu/ täs äſẜohtz kas/ vnd
tas tomähr nhe gir nheneeka/ tas peewiļļahß ẜöw pattz. Bett
ickweens laid luhko vs ẜawu paſſchu darrbu/ vnnd tad buhß
tam py ẜöw paſſcham Ghohds/ vnd nhe py zittu. Aiſto ick
weens ẜawu Naßtu neſẜies.
Bett tas kas pamahzietz tohp ar to Wahrdu/ tam buhß
ißdallieth wiſẜu labbumu tam kas to pamahza. Nhe alloyeetees/
Deews nhe leekahß apſmeetees. Aiſto ko tas Zillwähx
ẜeh/ to tas pļaws. Kas vs to Meeſẜu ẜeh/ tas no to Meeſẜu to
ẜamaitaſchanu pļaws. Bett kas vs to Gharru ẜeh/ tas no to
Gharru to muhſchigu dſiewoſchanu pļaws. Bett laideeta
mums labbe darriet/ vnd nhe peekuſt. Aiſto ẜawà laikà mehß
arridſan pļauſẜim bes mitteſchanas. Kad mums nu laix gir/
tad laideeta mums labbe darrieth ick=kattram/ bett wißwairahk
py tahß Titzibas draugheems.
Evangelium am funffzehenden Sontage
nach Trinitatis/ Matth. 6.
JEſus ẜatziya vs teem Ļaudeem: Nhe weens nhe
warr diweem Kungeem kallpoht/ jeb tam buhß weenu
ee=niedeht/ vnd to ohtru mieloht/ jeb tam buhß weenam
peekehrtees/ vnnd no to ohtru atſtaht. Juhß nhe
warreeta Deewam kallpoht/ vnnd tam Mammoņam.
Tapehtz ẜacku es jums/ Nhe ghadayeeta par juhſẜu Dſiewibu/
ko juhß ehdieſẜeeta vnd dſerrſẜeeta/ neds arridſan
par juhſẜu Meeſẜu/ ko juhß apwillxeeta. Negg gir ta
Dſiewiba labbaka nhe ka
ta Barriba? Vnd ta Meeſẜa
labbaka nhe ka tahß
Drehbes. Raughaita vs
teems Puttneems appackſchan
to däbbäſẜu/ Tee nhe
ẜeh/ tee nhe pļaw/ tee nhe
ẜawädd Skuny/ vnd juhſẜo
Däbbäſẜo Tähws barryo
tohß tomähr. Negg eſẜeeta juhß tad dauds labbaki/ nhe
ka tee? Kas gir juhſẜo ſtarrpa/ katters ẜawai gharŗumai
weenu Ohleckti peelickt warr/ jeb tas tadehļ ghañ bähdayahß.
Vnd kapehtz ghadayeeta juhß par tahm Drehbem?
Raughaita vs teem Pugkeem wirß lauku/ ka tee
aug. Tee nhe ſtrahda/ neds tee arridſan wehrp. Es ẜacku
jums/ ka arridſan Salomons wiſẜà ẜawà Ghohdibà
nhe gir tha apghärbtz biyis/ ka weens no teem paſſcheem.
Ja tad Deews to Sahl wirß Lauku tha apgherb/ kattra
ſchodeen ſtahw/ vnd riete Krahßny eemäſta tohp/
negg by tad tam to jums wehl wairahkwehlwairahk darriet? O juhß
wahyititzigi!
Tapehtz nhe buhß jums ghadaht/ vnd ẜatziet: Ko
mehß ehdieſẜim/ ko mehß dſerrſẜim/ ar ko mehß ẜöw apgherbẜimees?
Pehtz tahdu leetu ghada tee Paggaņi/ aiſto
juhſẜo Däbbäſẜo Tähws ſinna/ ka jums tahdas leetas
wayaga gir. Ghadayeeta wiß pirrmahk pehtz Deewa
Wallſtibas/ vnd pehtz winja Taißnibas/ tad jums
wiſẜas ſchahß leetas peekritties. Tapehtz nhe ghadayeeta
par to nahkoſchu Rietu/ aiſto ta Rietasdeena par ẜöw
paſſcham ghadahß. Tas gir ghann/ ka ick=kattrai Deeni
ẜawas paſſchas bähdas gir.
Epiſtel am ſechzehenden Sontage nach Tri-
nitatis/ Epheſ. 3.
MYļi Brahļi/ es luhdſu/ ka juhß nhe peekuhſtaht/ maño
bähdo dehļ/ kattrus es juſẜo dehļ zeeſcho/ kattri jums
Ghodà gir. Tapehtz lohku es ẜawus zeļļus preekſchan
to Tähwu muhſẜa Kunga JEſu CHriſti/ katters tas ihſtäns
Tähws gir par wiſẜeem/ kattri Tähws dehwe/ eekſchan Debbes
vnd wirſẜu Semmes/ ka tas jums Spähku dohd pehts
to Baggatibu ẜawas Ghodibas/ ſtippreems tapt zaur ẜawu
Gharru py to eekſchigu Zillwäku/ vnnd CHriſtum dſiewoht
zaur to Titzibu juhſẜahß Ꞩyrdys/ vnd zaur to Mylibu eeẜacknoti/
vnnd eedibbinati tohpat/ ka juhß ẜayembt warreeta ar
wiſẜeems Ꞩwähteems/ kas gir tas Plattums/ vnd tas Gharŗums/
vnd tas Dſiļļums/ vnd ta Auxtiba. Arridſan adſiet/
ka CHriſtum myļoht/ dauds labbahke gir/ nheka wiſẜas leetas
ſinnaht/ ka juhß peepillditi tohpeeta ar wiſẜenahdu Deewa
pillnibu.
Bett tam/ katters dauds wairahk darryht war par
wiſẜu/ ko mehß luhdſam jeb ẜaprohtam/ pehts to Spähku/
katters eekſchan mums ſtrahda/ tam gir Ghohds eekſchan
tahß Draudſibas/ kattra eekſchan CHriſto JEſu gir/ wiſẜà
laikà/ muhſchige/ Amen.
Evangelium am ſechszehenden Sontage
nach Trinitatis/ Luc. 7.
VNd pehts to notickahß/ ka JEſus weenà Pilly/ ar
wahrdu Nain/ ghaya/ vnd dauds no winja Mahzekļeem
ghaya liedſe/ vnnd dauds Ļaudis. Bett kad
wings tuwe py Pillswahrteem nahze/ Rauge/ tad ißneſẜe
tee weenu Mirroni/
katters weens weeniegs
Dähls ẜawas Mahtes
by/ vnd tha by Attraitne.
Vnnd dauds Pillsļaudis
ghaya ar tahß. Vnd kad to
tas Kungs redſeya/ truhka
tam Ꞩirds par tahß/ vnnd
ẜatziya vs tahß. Nhe raudi.
Vnd peeghaya/ vnd aiſkahre to Mirronſkirrſtu/ vnd tee
Neſẜeyi ſtahweya. Vnd wings ẜatziya/ Puiſẜi/ es ẜacku
töw/ zelleeß aukſcham/ vnd tas Puiſẜis zehlehß aukſcham/
vnd eeẜahka runnaht. Vnnd wings eedeewe to ẜawai
Mahtei. Vnd Biyaſchana pahrghaya par wiſẜus/ vnd
teitze Deewu/ vnd ẜatziya/ Leels Proweets muhſẜo ſtarpa
gir pazehlees/ vnd Deews gir ẜawus Ļaudis apraudſiyis.
Vnd ſchy Wallohda no winju ißpauda par wiſẜu
Juddo Semm/ vnnd wiſẜahß apkahrt ghullamahß
Semmehß.
Epiſtel am ſiebenzehenden Sontage nach
Trinitatis/ Eph. 4.
MYļi Braļi/ Es zeetumà buhdams eekſchan to Kungu/
peemiņņu jums nu/ ka juhß ſtaighayeeta/ ka juhſẜai Aitzenaſchanai
peeklayahß/ eekſchan kattru juhß aitzenati eſẜeeta/
ar wiſẜu Sämmoſchanu vnnd Lehnpratibu/ ar Patzeeſchanu/
vnd zeeteeta weens ohtru eekſchan mileſtibas/ vnd turraita
no Ꞩirdts to Weenaidibu Gharrà/ zaur to Ꞩaitu ta
Meera. Weena Meeſẜa/ vnnd weens Gharrs/ ka juhß arridſan
aitzenati eſẜeeta/ vs weenadigu zerribu juhſẜas Aitzenaſchanas.
Weens Kungs/ weena Titziba/ weena Chriſtiba/
weens Deews vnnd Tähws (muhſẜo) wiſẜo/ katters gir par
jums wiſẜeem/ vnnd zaur jums wiſẜeem/ vnd eekſchan jums
wiſẜeem.
Evangelium am ſiebenzehenden Sontage
nach Trinitatis/ Luc. 14.
VNd tas notickahß/ ka JEſus nahze weena Wirſẜeeneeka
Nammà/ Ꞩwähtà deenà to Mais ehſt. Vnd
tee ghluneya vs winju. Vnd raugi/ turr by weens Zillwähx
preekſchan winju/ tas
by Vdenaſehrdſiegs. Vnd
JEſus adbilldeya/ vnnd
runnaya vs teem Raxta
Mazetayeems vnd Wariſeereems/
vnd ẜatziya: Arrieg
peedärr Ꞩwähtà deenà
dſedenaht? Bett tee zeete
kluſẜe. Vnd wings jeme/
vnd dſeedenaya to/ vnd pallaide to. Vnnd adbilldeya/
vnd ẜatziya vs teem: Kas gir juhſẜo ſtarpà/ kam ẜaws
Wehrſẜis jeb Eſelis Ackà eekriet/ vnd tas to tudeļ nhe ißwällk
Ꞩwähtà deenà. Vnnd tee nhe warraya winjam
nhe neeka vs to atkal adbildeht.
Bett wings ẜatziya weenu Liedſibu teem Weeſẜeem/
nomannidams/ ka tee wehleyahß auxtakà weetà ẜehdeht/
vnd ẜatziya vs teem: Kad tu no weenu aitzenahts
kļuhſti Kahſahß/ tad nhe ẜehdees auxtakà Weetà/ ka nhe
nahx kahds zeenigahx/ nhe ka tu/ kas no winju aitzenahts
gir. Vnd kad tas tad nahk/ kas töw vnd winju aitzenayis
gir/ vs töw ẜacka/ wirrſees ſchim/ vnd töw buhß tad
ar Kaunu ſämmoyà weetà ẜehdeht. Bett kad tu aitzenahts
kļuhſti/ tad no=ey/ vnnd ẜehdees ſämmoyà weetà/
kad tas nahk/ kas töw aitzenayis gir/ vs töw ẜacka:
Draugs/ wirrſees aukſcham. Tad buhß töw Ghohds
preekſchan teems/ kattri ar töw py Ghalldu ſehſch. Aiſto
kas ẜöw patz auxtenayahßautztenayahß/ tam buhß ſämmotam tapt/
vnnd kas ẜöw patz ſämmoyahß/ tam buhß auxtenatam
tapt.
Epiſtel am achtzehenden Sontage nach Tri-
nitatis/ 1. Corinth. 1.
MYļi Brahļi/ Es patteitzu mannam Deewam allaſchien/
juhſẜo dehl/ par to Deewa ſchälaſtibu/ kattra jums dohta
gir eekſchan CHriſto JEſu. Ka juhß eſẜeeta zaur to
wiſẜohß Ghabbalohß baggati darriti/ wiſẜa Mahzibà/ vnnd
wiſẜà atſiſchanà. Ka tad ta Mahziba no CHriſto eekſchan
jums ſpehziga tappuſẜi gir/ tha ka jums nhe=neekads Dawans
peetruhxt/ vnnd ghaidaita ween vs to Paradiſchanu muhſẜa
Kunga JEſu CHriſti/ katters juhß arridſan ſtipprus paturrehß
ihß Ghallam/ ka juhß nheẜohdami eſẜeeta/ vs to Deenu
muhſẜa Kunga JEſu CHriſti. Aiſto Deews gir peetitziegs/
zaur kattru juhß aitzenati eſẜeeta/ py tahß Draudſibas ẜawa
Dähla JEſu CHriſti muhſẜa Kunga.
Evangelium am achtzehenden Sontage
nach Trinitatis/ Matth. 22.
KAd tee Wariſeeri dſirrdeya/ ka JEſus teem Saduceereems
to Mutt aisbahſis by/ ẜapullzeyahß
tee. Vnd weens ſtarpan teem/ weens Raxtamazetais
kahrdenaya to/ vnd ẜatziya: Meiſteri/ kurrſch gir tas
auxtakais Baußlis eekſchan
to Baußlu? Bett
JEſus ẜatziya vs to: Töw
buhß Deewu tawu Kungu
myļoht no wiſẜas
Ꞩirrds/ no wiſẜas Dwehẜſeles/
no wiſẜu Prahtu.
Tas gir tas auxtakais
Baußlis. Bett tas ohtris
gir tam liedſäns: Töw buhß tawu Tuwaku myļoht/ ka
ẜöw paſſchu. Schinnies diweyohß Baußlies karrayahß
wiß Baußlis/ vnd tee Proweetes.
Kad nu tee Wariſeeri kohpa by/ jautaya tohß JEſus/
vnnd ẜatziya: Ko ſkeetaht juhß no CHriſto? Ka
Dähls gir tas? Winyi ẜatziya/ Dawida. Tas ẜatziya
vs teem: Ka ẜaudts to tad Dawids Gharrà par Kungu?
Ꞩatzidams: Tas Kungs ẜatziya vs mannu Kungu/
ẜehdees pa mannu labbu Rohku/ teekams es tawus
Eenaidneekus leeku par Pamäßlu tawahm Kayahm.
Ja to nu Dawids Kungu ẜautz/ ka gir tas tad winja
Dähls? Vnnd nhe weens nhe ſinnaya tam kahdu
Wahrdu adbildeht/ vnd nhe drieſteya arridſan no tahß
Deenas tam wairs jautaht.
Epiſtel am neunzehenden Sontage nach
Trinitatis/ Epheſ. 4.
MYļi Braļi/ noleetzeeta nu no jums/ pehts to preekſchu
buhſchanu to wätzu Zillwäku/ katters zaur Kahribeem
eekſchan Apalloſchanas ẜöw ẜamaitayahß. Bett atjaunayeetees
eekſchan Gharru juhſẜo Prahto/ vnnd apwellzeeta
to jaunu Zillwäku/ katters pehts Deewu raddiets gir eekſchan
ihſtänu Taißnibu vnd Swehtibu. Tapehts noleetzeeta tohß
Mälus/ vnnd runnayeeta Teeſcham/ ick=kattris ar ẜawu Tuwaku/
Aiſto mehß muhſẜo ſtarpa äſẜam Lohzekļi. Dußmoyeeta/
vnd nhe ghräkoyeeta/ nhe leetzeeta to Ꞩaul par juhſẜu
dußmibu noreeſt. Nhe atkapeeta tam Saimotayam. Kas
ſadſis gir/ tam nhe buhß wairs ſackt/ bett ſtradaht/ vnd pellniet
ar Rokahm ko labb/ ka tas warr doht tam Wayadſigam.
Evangelium am neunzehenden Sontage
nach Trinitatis/ Matth. 9.
JEſus kahpe Laywà/
vnnd zehlehß attkal
pahr/ vnd nahze ẜawà Pili.
Vnnd raugi/ tad neſẜe tee
weenu Mällmänaẜehrdſigu/
tas ghulleya Ghulltà.
Kad nu JEſus winjo Titzibu
redſeya/ ẜatziya tas vs
to Mällmänaſehrdſigu/ turrais labbu Prahtu/ mans
Dähls/ tawi Ghräki gir töw peedohti. Vnd raugi/ zitti
ſtarrpan teems Raxtamazetayeems runnaya ẜawà ſtarpà:
Schiß ſaimo Deewu. Bett kad JEſus winjo
Dohmas redſeya/ ẜatziya tas: Kapehts domayeeta juhß
tick ļaun juhſẜahß Ꞩirrdyhß? Kas gir lähtake ẜatziet:
Töw gir tawi Ghräki peedohti/ jeb ẜatziet: Zellees/ vnd
ſtaiga? Bett ka juhß ſinnaht/ ka ta Zillwäka Dählam
Warra gir wirs Semmes tohß Ghrähkus peedoht/ ẜatziya
tas vs to Mällmänaẜehrdſigu: Zellees aukſcham/
jemm tawu Ghulltu/ vnd ey Mahyahß. Vnd tas zehlehß
aukſcham vnd ghaya Mahyahß. Kad tee Ļaudis
to redſeya/ brynoyahß tee/ vnnd teitze Deewu/ katters
tahdu Spähku teem Zillwäkeem dewis gir.
Epiſtel am zwantzigſten Sontage nach Tri-
nitatis/ Epheſ. 5.
MYļi Brahļi/ peelukoyeeta nu/ ka juhß apdohmige ſtaigayeeta/
nhe ka tee Nheghuddri/ bett ka tee Ghuddri/
vnd ẜattaiſẜeetees laikà/ Aiſto nhelabbs laix. Tapehts
nhe tohpeeta nheẜaprohtigi/ bett prohtaita/ kas tha Kungha
Prahts gir. Vnd nhe peeriyeetees no Wynu/ no kurrenes
nickna dſiewoſchana attlätz. Bett tohpeeta pilli Gharru/
vnd runnayeeta juhſẜo ſtarrpà no dſeeßmeems/ vnd Patteitzibas
dſeeßmeems/ vnd gharrigheems dſeeßmeems/ dſeedayeeta
vnnd meeßloyeeta tam Kungham juhſẜahß Ꞩirrdihß/
vnd pateitzeeta allaſchien par wiſẜu leetu/ Deewam vnd tam
Tähwam eekſchan to Wahrdu muhſẜa Kungha JEſu CHriſti/
vnnd eſẜeeta juhſẜo ſtarpà paklauſẜgi/ eekſchan Deewa biyaſchanas.
Evangelium am zwantzigſten Sontage
nach Trinitatis/ Matth. 22.
JEſus runnaya atkal zaur Liedſibu vs teems Auxteem
Baſnizaskungheem/ vnd ẜatziya: Ta Debbeſẜes=wallſtiba
gir liedſa weenam Koninjam/ katters ẜawam
Dählam Kahſas darriya. Vnd iſẜuhtiya ẜawus
Kallpus/ tohß Weeſẜis Kahſahß
aitzenaht. Vnd tee nhe
ghribbeya nahkt. Atkal
iſẜuhtiya wings zittus Kallpus/
vnd ẜatziya/ ẜackaita
teem Weeſẜeem/ Raughaita/
mans Ähdenaghahds gir
ẜattaiſẜiets/ manni Wehrẜchi/
vnd manni Baŗŗoma=
lohpi gir nokauti/ vnd wiſẜas leetas ẜattaiſẜitas/ nahzeeta
Kahſahß. Bett tee nitzinaya to/ vnnd nogaya/ zitts
vs ẜawu Tyrumu/ zitts py ẜawu Darrbu. Bett zitti ẜaghrabe
winja Kallpus/ ſaimoya/ vnnd nokawa tohß.
Kad to tas Konings dſirrdeya/ tappa tas dußmiegs/
vnd iſẜutiya ẜawu Spähku/ vnd licka ſchohß Släppkawus
nokaut/ vnd eedädſenaya winjo Pili.
Tad ẜatziya wings vs ẜaweems Kallpeems: Tahß
Kahſas gir ghattaw ẜattaiſẜitas/ bett tee Weeſẜis nhe by
zeenigi. Tapehts eita vs teem Eeleem/ vnd aitzenayeeta
Kahſahß/ kuŗŗohß juhß attrohdaht. Vnnd tee Kallpi
ißghaya vs teem Eeleem/ vnd ẜackraya/ kahdus attrasdami/
ļaunus vnd labbus/ vnnd tee Ghalldi kļua wiſẜi
pilli. Tad eeghaya tas Konings/ tohß Weeſẜis apraudſiet/
vnd eelukoya weenu Zillwäku/ tam nhe by Kahſadrehbes
muggurà. Vnd ẜatziya vs to: Draugs/ ka
eſẜi tu ſcheitan eenahzis/ vnd nhe eſẜe Kahſadrehbes apwillzis?
Bett wings ka Mähms pallicka. Tad ẜatziya
tas Konings vs ẜaweem Kallpeem: Ꞩeeneeta tam
Rohkas vnd Kayas/ vnd ißmetteeta to Tumſẜibà/ tur
buhß Kaukſchana vnd Sohbo trieſẜeſchana. Aiſto dauds
gir aitzenati/ bett mas gir ißrädſäti.
Epiſtel am ein=vnd=zwantzigſten Sontage
nach Trinitatis/ Eph. 6.
PEhdige/ manni Braļi/ eſẜeeta ſtippri eekſchan to Kungu/
vnnd eekſchan Warru ẜawà ſtipprumà. Apwellzeeta
tahß Deewa Brunņas/ ka juhß warreeta prettie ſtahweht/
tai willtigai vstetzeſchanai tha Wälla. Aiſto mums
nhe gir ar Meeſẜu vnnd Aſẜini ja=kauyahß/ bett ar leeleem
Kungeem vnnd Spehzigeem/ ar wahrdu/ ar Kungeem tahß
Paſẜaules/ kattri ſchahß Paſẜaules Tumſẜumà wallda/ ar
teem ļauneem Gharreem appakſchan Debbes. Tapehts ẜaghrabeeta
tohß Deewa Bruņņas/ ka juhß/ kad ta ļauna
Stundinya nahk/ prettie ſtahweht/ vnnd wiſẜas leetas labbe
ißtaiſẜiet/ vnd vswahreht warreeta.
Tad ſtahweeta nu/ apyoẜuſchi juhſẜus Ghurrnus ar
Taißnibu/ vnnd apwilkti ar teems Kruhſchabruņņeem tahß
Taißnibas/ vnnd ap Kayahms apſabaghoti/ ka ghattawi
mahziet to Evangelium ta Meera. Bett par wiſẜahms leetahms/
ẜaghrabeeta tohß Ällkona Bruņņas tahß Titzibas/
ar kattru juhß warreeta ißdſehſt wiſẜas dedſigas bulltas ta
Blehdneeka. Vnnd jemmeeta to Bruņņazeppur tahß Peſtiſcha-
vnnd to Sohbeni ta Gharra/ katters gir tas
Deewa Wahrds.
Evangelium am ein=vnd=zwantzigſten Son-
tage nach Trinitatis/ Joh. 4.
THa Koninja Ꞩullainis by/ tha Dähls ghulleya
nhewäſẜäls Capernaumà. Ꞩchis dſirrdeya/ ka JEſus
nahtze no Judea/ eekſchan
Galileam/ vnd noghaya
py to/ vnd luhdſe to/
ka tas noſtaighatu/ vnd
palliedſähtu winja Dählam.
Aiſto tas by ihß tay
Nawei nhewäſẜäls. Vnd
JEſus ẜatziya vs to: Ja
juhß Siemes vnd Brynumus
nhe rädſaht/ tad juhß nhe titzaht. Tas Koninya
Ꞩullainis ẜatziya vs winju. Kungs/ nahtz/ pirms
mans Bährns mirrſt. JEſus ẜatziya vs to: Ey proyam/
taws Dähls dſiewo. Tas Zillwähx titzeya tam Wahrdam/
kattru JEſus vs to ẜatziya/ vnd aisghaya.
Vnd no=eyoht ẜattapa tam winja Kallpi/ paſluddenaya
tham/ vnd ẜatziya/ Taws Bährns dſiewo. Tad
ißwaizaya tas no teem to Stundu/ kad labbahk ar winju
kļuis by. Vnd tee ẜatziya/ Wackar ap to ẜeptitu ſtundu
atſtahya tas Draudſis. Tad nomanniya tas Tähws/
ap to ſtundu äſẜam/ kad JESVS ẜatziya vs to/ Taws
Dähls dſiewo. Vnd tas titzeya ar wiſẜu ẜawu Ꞩaim.
Ta gir nu ohtra Syme/ kattru JEſus darriya/ nahkdams
no Judea eekſchan Galileà.
Epiſtel am zwey=vnd=zwantzigſten Sontage
nach Trinitatis/ Philipp. 1.
MYļi Braļi/ Es patteitzu mannam Deewam/ zeekahrt es
juhſẜo peeminu (kattru es allaſch darru/ wiſẜohß mannohß
Patarohß par jums wiſẜeem/ vnd darru tohß Patarus
ar Lyxmibu) par juhſẜu Draudſibu py to Ewangelio/
no pirrmahß Deenas ihß ſcho. Vnd äßmu labba zerribà/ ka
tas/ katters eekſchan jums eeẜahzis gir to labbu darrbu/ tas
to arridſan pabeix/ ihß tai Deeny JEſu CHriſti/ ka man
tad peedärr/ tha no jums wiſẜeems zerreht/ Tapehts ka es
jums mannà Ꞩirdy turru/ ſchinni mannà zeetumà/ kur es
to Ewangelium aißbilldu/ vnnd apſtippru/ ka juhß wiſẜi ar
man to ſchälaſtibu dabbuyuſchi eſẜeeta.
Aiſto Deews gir mans Leezeneex/ ka mannai Ꞩirrdei
ſchäle gir pehts jums ekſchan JEſu CHriſto/ vnnd par to
luhdſcho es/ ka juhſẜa myleſtiba jo Deenas jo wairahk baggata
tohp/ wiſẜenadà atſiſchanà vnd ẜajuſẜchanà/ ka juhß baudyht
warraht/ kas labbahx gir/ ka juhß tyre vnnd nhe peedauſighi
eſẜeeta ihß tai Deeny CHriſti/ peepillditi ar augļeems
tahß Taißnibas/ kattra zaur JEſum CHriſtum notikuſẜi
gir (eekſchan jums) Deewam par Ghodu vnd Ꞩlawu.
Evangelium am 22. Sontage nach Trini-
nitatis/ Matth. 18.
JEſus ẜatziya vs ẜaweem Mahzekļeem: Ta Däbbäſẜo=wallſtiba
gir liedſa weenam Koninjam/ katters
ar ẜaweems Kallpeems laghadiet gribbeya. Vnnd kad
tas eeẜahka laghadiet/ nahze tam weens preekſchan/ tas
by tam deßmitz tuhxtoſchus Pohdus parrada. Kad tas
nu nhe=ſpehya to maxaht/ pawehleya tas Kungs pardoht
ẜöw/ ẜawu Ꞩeewu/ vnd ẜawus Bährnus/ vnd wis
kas tam by/ vnd maxaht. Tad kritta tas Kallps ſemme/
vnd peeluhdſe to/ vnnd ẜatziya/ Kungs/ eſẜi ar man ar
Meeru/ es gribbu töw wiſẜunotaļ maxaht. Tad by tam
Kungham ſchäl ta Kallpa/ vnd palaide to/ vnnd to
Parradu atlaide tas tam arridſan.
Tad ißghaya tas patz
Kallps ara/ vnd attradda
weenu no ẜaweem Beedra=
kallpeem/ tas by tam ẜimbtus
Groſſchus parrada.
Vnd tas ẜakampe to/ vnd
ſchņaudſe to/ vnnd ẜatziya/
maxa man/ ko tu man parrada
eſẜi. Tad kritta winja
Beedrakallps ſemme/ vnd luhdſe to/ vnd ẜatziya/ Eſẜi ar
man ar Meeru/ es gribbu töw wiſẜunotaļ maxaht. Bett
wings nhe gribbeya/ vnd noghaya/ vnd mette to zeetumà/
teekams tas maxaya/ ko tas parrada by.
Bett kad winja Beedrakallpi ſchahß leetas redſeya/
tappa tee ļohte noſkummuſchi/ nahze vnd paſẜatziya ẜawam
Kungam/ wiß kas by notitzis. Tad aitzenaya to
winja Kungs preekſch ẜöw/ vnd ẜatziya vs to: Tu blehdygs
Kallps/ wiſẜu ſcho Parradu äßmu es töw attlaidis/
kad tu man luhdſi/ nhe by töw tad arridſan abſchälotees/
par tawu Beedrakallpu/ ka es ẜöw par töw abſchäloyohß?
Vnd winja Kungs apſkaita/ vnd nodewe
to teem Mohzetayeem/ teekams tas maxatu wiß ko tas
tam by parrada. Tha jums mans Däbbäſẜo Tähws
arridſan darrys/ ja juhß nhe peedohſẜeeta no juhſẜeems
Ꞩirrdeems ick weens ẜawam Brahļam ẜawu Wainu.
(ẜawus Grähkus.)
Epiſtel am 23. Sontage nach Trinitatis/
Philipp. 3.
MYļi Braļi/ ſtaigayeeta man pehts/ vnd lukoyeeta vs
teems/ kattri ta ſtaiga/ ka mehß jums äſẜam par Preekſche
Siem. Aiſto dauds ſtaiga/ no kattreems es jums
daſche kahrt äßmu ẜatziyis/ bett nu ẜacku es jums arridſan
raudadams/ tee Eenaidneeki ta Kruſta CHriſti/ kattro Galls
gir ta Paſuſſchana/ kattro Deews tas Wähdärs gir/ vnnd
kattro Ghohds kannà tohp/ tho/ kattri ſemmiſchke dohma.
Bett muhſẜa dſiewoſchana gir Debbeſẜihß/ no kurrenes
mehß arridſan ghaidam to Peſtitayu JEſum CHriſtum to
Kungu. Katters muhſẜu neezigu Meeſẜu apſkaidrohß/ ka ta
liedſäna kļuhſt ẜawai apſkaidrotai Meeſẜi/ pehts to darrbu/
ar kattru wings arridſan war wiſẜas leetas ẜöw paklauſẜigus
darriet.
Evangelium am 23. Sontage nach Trini-
tatis/ Matth. 22.
TAd nogaya tee Wariſeeri/ vnd turreya Runnas/
(ẜarunnayahß/) ka tee JEſum ẜawà Wallodà ẜayämtu.
Vnd ẜuhtiya py to ẜawus Mahzekļus/ ar Herodis
Ꞩullaineems/ vnd ẜatziya/ Meiſter/ mehß ſinnam ka
tu taißnis eſẜi/ vnd mahzi to Deewa zeļļu teeſcham/ vnd
tu nhe bähda pehtz nheweenu/ Aiſto tu nhe ohla to Vsluhkoſchanu
tho Zillwäko. Tapehtz ẜacki mums/ ko
ſkeet tu/ girahk tas pareiſe/ ka mehß tam Keiſeŗam Nohmu
dohdam/ jeb nhe? Kad
nu JEſus winjo blehdibu
nomanniya/ ẜatziya tas:
Juhß Willtineeki/ ko ißklauſẜaita
juhß mann? Radaita
mann ſchurr to Nohmakauſẜu.
Vnd tee parahdiya
tham weenu Ghroſẜi.
Vnd wings ẜatziya vs teem:
Ka Syhme gir tha/ vnnd tas Wirſẜoraxtz? Tee ẜatziya
vs winju: Ta Keyſeŗa. Tad ẜatziya wings vs teem:
Tad dohdeeta tam Keyſeŗam/ kas tam Keyſeŗam peedärr/
vnd Deewam kas Deewam peedärr. Kad tee to
dſirrdeya/ iſẜabrienoyahß tee/ vnnd atſtahya to/ vnd
ghaya nohſt.
Epiſtel am 24. Sontage nach Trinitatis/
Coloſſ. 1.
MYļi Brahļi/ Mehß nhe mittam par jums luhkt/ ka juhß
peepillditi tohpat/ ar Atſiſchanu Deewa prahta/ eekſchan
wiſẜas gharrigas ghuddribas vnnd ẜappraſſchanas/
ka juhß ſtaighayeeta zeenige tam Kungam pa wiſẜam
prahtam. Vnnd aughligi eſẜeeta eekſchan wiſẜeem labbeem
darrbeem/ vnd aughaita eekſchan Deewa atſiſchanas/ vnnd
eeſtipprenati tohpeeta ar wiſẜenadu Warru/ pehtz winja ghohdigu
ſpähku/ eekſchan wiſẜenadas pazeeſchanas/ vnnd lehnprahtibas/
ar Liexmibu/ vnnd patteizibu ẜackam tam Tähwam/
kas mums derrigus darriyis gir/ py tahß Bährna
manntibas to Ꞩwähto eekſchan ghaiſchumas. Katters
mums peſtiyis gir/ no to Spähku tahß Tumbſẜibas/ vnd gir
mums pahrſtattiyis eekſchan tahß Wallſtibas ẜawa mieļa
Dähla/ py kattru mums gir ta Peſtiſchana zaur ẜawu Aſẜini/
ar wahrdu ta Peedoſchana to Ghräko.
Evangelium am 24. Sontage nach Trini-
tatis/ Matth. 9.
KAd JEſus runnaya ar Jaņa Mahzekļeem/ raugi/
tad nahze weens no teem Wirſẜeneekeem/ vnnd
kritta preekſchan to ſemme/
vnd ẜatziya/ Kungs/ manna
Meitha gir taggadien
nomirruſẜi/ bett nahz/ vnd
vsleetz ẜawu Rohku vs
tahß/ tad taps tha dſiewa.
JEſus zehlehß aukſcham/
vnd ſtaighaya tam packaļ/
vnd winja Mahzekļi. Vnd
raugi/ weena Ꞩeewa/ kattra diwipaddeßmitt ghaddus
Aſẜinsẜährgà by ghulleyuſẜi/ ghaya attpackaļļ py to/ vnd
aißkahre winja drehbes Wiehl. Aiſto ta ẜatziya py ẜöw
paſſchu/ warrätu es ween winja Drehbes Wiel aißkahrt/
tad taptu es Wäſẜäla. Tad attgreſehß JEſus
apkahrt/ vnd vsluhkoya to/ vnd ſatziya: Turrais labbu
prahtu manna Meita/ tawa Titziba gir töw palliedſeyuſẜi.
Vnd ta Ꞩeewa tappa Wäſẜäla tanny paſſchà
ſtundà.
Vnd kad wings tha Wirrſẜeneeka Nammà nahze/
vnd redſeya tohß Stabbulneekus/ vnd to Trohxne to
Ļauſcho/ ẜatziya wings vs teems/ Attkahpeetees/ aiſto
ta Meitinya nhe gir nomirruſẜi/ bett ta ghull. Vnd tee
apſmehya winju. Bett kad tee Ļaudis ißdſieti by/ ghaya
wings eekſcha/ vnd ẜathwere to py Rohkas. Tad zehlehß
ta Meitinya aukſcham. Vnd ta Ꞩlawa ißpauda
par to paſſchu wiſẜu Semm.
Epiſtel am 25. Sontage nach Trinitatis/
1. Theſſ. 4.
MJeļi Brahļi/ Mehß nhe ghribbam jums ſlehpt/ no
teems kattri aiſmigguſchi gir/ ka juhß nhe eſẜeeta noſkummuſchi/
ka zitti/ kattreems zerriba nhe gir. Aiſto ja mehß
titzam/ ka JEſus nomirris/ vnd attkal aukſcham zehlees gir/
ihten ta arridſan Deews/ tohß/ kattri aismigguſchi gir/ zaur
JEſum/ ar to weddies.
Aiſto to ẜackam mehß jums/ ka weenu wahrdu tha
Kungha/ ka mehß/ kattri mehß dſiewoyam/ vnd attleekam/
kad tas Kungs attnahx/ teems nhe nahxim preekſchan/ kattri
aiſmigguſchi gir/ aiſto tas Kungs patz ar weenu Kleekſchanu
vnd Ballxni tha ihſtäna Engeļa/ vnd ar to Deewa Baſuni
ſcheit ſemmeh nahx no Däbbäſẜu. Vnd tee Mirroni eekſchan
CHriſto/ pirrmahk attkal aukſcham zelſẜees/ tad pehtz/ kattri
mehß dſiewoyam/ vnd attleekam/ tapſẜim lieds ar teems
paſſcheems norauti eekſchan teem Paddebbeſẜeem/ tam Kungham
prettie ghaiſẜà/ vnd ta buhſẜim mehß py to Kunghu
allaſchien. Ta eeliexmoyeetees ẜöw nu ar ẜcheem Wahrdeem
ẜawà ſtarrpà.
Evangelium am 25. Sontage nach Trini-
tatis/ Matth. 24.
JEſus ẜatziya vs ẜaweem Mahzekļeem: Kad juhß
nu redſeſẜeeta to nhe ghanntibu tahß ißpohſtiſchanas/
no kattru ẜatzietz gir zaur to Proweetu Daniel/ ka
tas ſtahw eekſchan to ẜwähtu weetu/ kas to laſẜa/ tam
buhß to labb abdohmaht. Tad laid bähg wirſẜon teem
Kallneem/ kas Juddo=Semmeh gir/ vnd kas wirs
Jumbtu gir/ tas laid nhe kahp ſemmeh/ ko labb no ẜawu
Nammu attneſteeß. Vnd kas wirrs Lauku gir/ tas laid
nhe attghreeſchahß ẜawas
Drehbes attneßtees. Bett
wai teem apgruhtenateem/
vnd Sieſchameem tanny
laikà. Bett luhdſeeta ka juhſẜajuhſkajuhſẜa
behkſchana nhe lätzahß
Seemà jeb Ꞩwehdeenà/ aiſto
tad tahdas leelas bähdas
buhß/ ka nhe gir biyuẜchi
no Eeẜakumu tahß Paſẜaules/ ihß ſchim/ vnd ka arridſan
wairs nhe buhß. Vnd ja ẜchahß Deenas nhe taptu
pa=ihſẜenatas/ tad nhe taptu nhe weens Zillwähx
ẜwähtz. Bett to Jßrädſäto dehļ tohp tahß Deenas pa=
iſẜenatas.
Ja tad kaßlabban vs jums ẜatzies/ Redſeeta/ ſcheit
gir CHriſtus/ jeb tur/ tad nhe buhß jums to titzeht/ aiſto
nhe vstitzami CHriſti/ vnd nhe=vstitzami Proweetes
ißdohſẜees/ vnd leelas Siemes vnd brienumus darris/
ka arridſan tee ißrädſäti (ja tas tha warrätu buht) leelà
peewillſchanà peewillti taptu. Redſeeta/ es äßmu
jums to papreekſch ẜatziyis. Tapehtz/ kad tee vs jums
ẜatzies/ redſeeta/ tas gir Tuxneſẜy/ tad nhe eita aran/ redſeeta/
tas gir Kambary/ tad nhe titzaht. Aiſto ihten ka
tas Sibbänes ißlätz no Rieta puſẜes/ vnd attſpied ihß
Wackara puſẜes/ ta buhß arridſan ta Attnahkſchana
tha zillwäka Dähla. Aiſto kurr Maita gir/ turr ẜackrahyahß
tee Ehrgļi.
Epiſtel am 26. Sontage nach Trinitatis/
2. Petr. 3.
MJeļi Brahļi/ ſinnaita to papreekſch/ ka eekſchan pehdigahm
Deenahm nahx Ꞩmehyehyi/ kattru pehtz ẜawu
paſſchu Prahtu dſiewohß/ vnd ẜatzies/ Kur gir ta ẜohliſchana
winja (Deewa) atnahkſchanas? Aiſto pehtz to ka tee
Tähwi aismigguſchi gir/ palleck wiſẜas leetas/ ta ka tahß no
Eeẜakumu tahß Raddibas bijuſchas gir. Bett nhe ghribbädammi
nhe ghribb tee ſinnaht/ ka ta Debbes pirrmayohß
laikohß arridſan by/ ta lieds arridſan ta Semme/ no Vdeni
vnd eekſchan Vdeni biyuſẜi zaur Deewa Wahrdu/ vnd tomähr
tappa tanny laikà ta Paſẜaule zaur teem paſſcheem ar
to Vdens ghräku (zaur to wahrdu vnd Vdeni.) ẜamaitata.
Ta arridſan ta Debbes/ kattra taggad gir/ vnd ta Semme/
tohp zaur winja Wahrdu ẜaudẜäta/ ka tee tam Vggunim paſẜarghati
tohp/ py to Deenu tahß Ꞩohdibas/ vnd py paſudenaſchanas
to behßdeewigo Zillwäko. Bett weenai leetai nhe
buhß jums paẜlähptai buht/ juhß mieligi/ ka weena Deena
preekſchan to Kungu gir ka tuhxtoſchi ghaddi/ vnd tuhxtoſchi
ghaddi ka weena Deena. Tas Kungs nhe kawe to Ꞩohliſchana/
ka daſchi to weenu kaweſchanu ſkeet/ bett tas gir lehniegs
ar mums/ vnnd nhe ghribb/ ka kamlabban buhß paſuſtam
tapt/ bett ka ick=kattris no Ghräkeems attſtahyahß.
Bett ta Deena ta Kunga nahx/ ka kahds Sagglis nackty/
eekſchan kattru tahß Debbeſẜes ißniex/ ar leelu brackſchkeſchanu/
bett tee Eẜakumi no karrſtamu ißkuſẜies/ vnd ta Semme/
vnd tee Darrbi/ kattri tur eekſchan gir/ taps ẜadädſenati.
Kad nu tam ta wiſẜam buhß ißniekt/ ka buhß jums tad
ẜattaiſẜitees? Ar ẜwätu dſiewoſchanu vnd buhſchanu kattra
Deewam patiek/ ka juhß ghaidaht vnd ſteidſatees vs to nhakoſchu
Deenu ta Kunga/ kad tahß Debbeſẜes ar Vgguni ißniex/
vnnd tee Eeẜakumi no karrſtumu ißkuſẜies. Bett mehß
ẜaghaidam weenu jaunu Debbes/ vnd weenu jaunu Semm/
ka wings ẜohliyis gir/ eekſchan kattras Taißniba dſiewo.
Evangelium am 26. Sontage nach Trini-
nitatis/ Matth. 25.
JEſus ẜatziya vs ẜaweem mahzekļeem: Kad ta Zillwäka
Dähls nahx eekſchan ẜawas Ghodibas/ vnd
wiſẜi Engeļi ar to/ tad tas
ẜehdehß vs to Krähßlu ẜawas
Ghodibas/ vnnd wiſẜi
Ļaudis taps preekſchan to
ẜakrahti/ vnd wings tohß
noſkirrß ihten ka kahds
Ghanns tahß Ahwis no
teems Ahſcheems noſkiŗŗ/
vnd tahß Ahwis taps pa
winja labbas Rohkas licktas/ bett tee Ahſchi pa kreiſẜas
Rohkas. Tad tas Konings ẜatzies vs teem pa ẜawas
labbas Rohkas: Nahzeeta ſchurr/ juhß ſwehtiti manna
Tähwa/ eemanntoyeeta to Wallſtibu/ kattra jums
ẜattaiſẜita gir no Eeẜakumu tahß Paſẜaules. Aiſto es
äßmu ißaltzis biyis/ vnd juhß eſẜeeta mann pee=ähdenayuſchi/
es äßmu ißtwiezis biyis/ vnd juhß eſẜeeta mann
dſirrdinayuſchi/ es äßmu Weeſẜis biyis/ vnd juhß eſẜeeta
mann mayoyuſchi/ es äßmu plix biyis/ vnd juhß eſẜeeta
mann aptährpuſchi/ es äßmu Nhewäſẜäls vnnd zeetumà
biyis/ vnd juhß eſẜeeta py mann nahkuſchi.
Tad tam tee Taißni adbilldehß/ vnd ẜatzies/ Kungs/
kad áſẜam mehß töw ißallkuſchu redſeyuſchi/ vnd äſẜam
töw pee=ähdenayuſchi? Jeb ißtwiekuſchu/ vnnd äſẜam
töw dſirrdinayuſchi? Kad äſẜam mehß töw parr Weeſẜi
redſeyuſchi/ vnd mahyoyuſchi? Jeb plicku/ vnnd äſẜam
töw aptährpuſchi? Kad äſẜam mehß töw nhewäſẜälu
jeb zeetumà redſeyuſchi/ vnnd äſẜam py töw nahkuſchi?
Vnd tas Konings adbilldehß/ vnd vs teem ẜatzies/ Pattees/
es ẜacku jums/ ko juhß eſẜeeta darriyuſchi weenam
no ſcheem manneems wißmaſakayeem Brahļeem/ to
eſẜeeta juhß mann darriyuſchi.
Tad wings arridſan ẜatzies vs teem/ pa kreiſẜas Rohkas:
Eita nohſt no mann juhß nolahdäti eekſchan to
muhſchigu Vgguni/ katters tur ẜataiſẜietz gir tam Wällam/
vnnd ẜaweem Engeļeem. Es äßmu ißallzis biyis/
vnnd juhß nhe eſẜeeta man peeähdenayuſchi/ es äßmu
ißtwiezis biyis/ vnd juhß nhe eſẜeeta mann dſirrdinayuſchi/
es äßmu Weeſẜis biyis/ vnd juhß nhe eſẜeeta mann
mahyoyuſchi/ es äßmu plix biyis/ vnnd juhs nhe eſẜeeta
mann aptährpuſchi/ Es äßmu Nhewäſẜäls vnd Zeetumà
biyis/ vnnd juhs nhe eſẜeeta mann apraudſiyuſchi.
Tad tee arridſan adbilldehs/ vnnd ẜatzies/ Kungs/ kad
äſẜam mehs töw redſeyuſchi ißallkuſchu/ jeb ißtwiekuſchu
jeb Weeſẜi/ jeb plicku/ jeb Nhewäſẜälu/ jeb zeetumà/
vnd nhe äſẜam töw kallpoyuſchi? Tad wings adbilldehß
vnd ẜatzies/ Pattees es ẜacku jums/ ko juhß nhe eſẜeeta
darriyuſchi/ weenam no ſcheem wißmaſakayeem/ to nhe
eſẜeeta juhß mann arridſan darriyuſchi. Vnnd tee ees
eekſchan tahß muhſchigas mohzibas/ bett tee Taißni
eekſchan tahß muhſchigas dſiewoſchanas.
Epiſtel am 27. Sontage nach Trinitatis/
2. Petr. 1.
MYļi Brahļi/ es nhe ghribbu miſt/ jums allaſchien attminneht/
ka juhß to ſinnahtſinnnaht/ vnd eeſtipprenahti eſẜeeta
eekſchan tahs preekſchabuhdamas taißnibas. Aiſto
es ſkeetohs pareiſe darram/ tick illge ka es ẜchinny Buhdà
äßmu/ juhs vsmodenaht/ vnnd peemineht. Aiſto es ſinnu/
ka es ẜawu buhdu dries attſtahſchu/ ka mann to arridſan
muſẜo Kungs JEſus Chriſtus gir ſinnamu darriyis. Bett
es ghribbu ta ſtrahdaht/ ka juhs wiſẜur to warreeta kad es
buhſſchu no jums attſtahyis/ peeminnädami patturreht.
Aiſto mehß nhe äſẜam klauſẜiyuſchi tohß Ghuddrus Paſẜackus/
kad mehß jums lickam ſinnaht to Spähku vnnd to Attnahkſchanu
muhſẜa Kunga JEſu CHriſti/ bett mehß äſẜam
winja Ghohdibu paſſchi redſeyuſchi/ kad wings dabbuya no
Deewu to Tähwu/ Ghohdu vnd Ꞩlawu/ zaur weenu ballxni/
kattra winjam/ noticka/ no tahß leelas Ghohdibas/ ar
Wahrdu: Ꞩchiß gir manns mieļais Dähls/ py kattru mann
labbs Prahtz girPrahtzgir. Vnnd ſcho Ballxni äſẜam mehß dſirrdeyuſchi
no Däbbäſẜu attnäſtu/ kad mehß ar to biyam/ wirs
to ẜwähtu Kallnu.
Evangelium am 27. Sontage nach Trini-
tatis Matth. 17.
PEhtz ẜeſſcham Deenahm jehme JEſus py ẜöw Peteri
vnd Jäcobu/ vnd Jahni winja Brahli/ vnd
wedde tohß ẜawißke vs weenu auxtu Kallnu/ vnd tappa
winjeem rädſoht apſkaidrohtz. Vnd winja Waigs ſpiedeya
ka ta Ꞩaule/ vnd winja Drehbes tappa balltas/
ka ta Ghaißma. Vnd redſi/ tad paradiyahß teem Moſes
vnd Elias/ tee runnaya ar winju. Bett Peteris adbilldeya
vñ ẜatziya vs JEſu/
Kungs ſcheit gir labba buhſchana/
ghribbi tu/ tad ghribbam
mehß ſcheit tries Buhdas
darriet/ weenu preekſch
töw/ Moſi ohtru/ vnd Elia
treſſchu. Kad tas wehl ta
runnaya/ redſi/ tad pahrſpiedehya
tohß weena ſpohſcha Padebbes/ vnd reds/ weena
Ballxne no tahß Padebbes ẜatziya/ Ꞩchis gir manns
myļais Dähls/ py kattru mann labbs Prahtz gir/ to
buhß jums klauſẜiet. Kad to tee Mahzekļi dſirrdeya/
kritta tee vs ẜawu Waigu/ vnd iſẜabiyayahß ļohte. Bett
JEſus ghaya py teem/ aiſkahre tohß/ vnd ẜatziya/ zelleetees
aukſcham/ vnd nhe iſẜabieſtatees.
Bett kad tee ẜawas Atzis pazehle/ nhe redſeya tee nhe
weenu/ ka JEſum ween. Vnd kad tee no to Kallnu ſemmeh
ghaiya/ aißleedſe teem JEſus/ vnd ſatziya/ jums
nhe buhß to ko juhß eſẜeeta redſeyuſchi/ nheweenam ẜatziet/
teekams ka ta Zillwäka Dähls no teem Mirroņeem
atkal aukſcham zehlees gir.
Folgen etliche Lettiſche
Epiſteln vnd Evangelia auff die fürnehmſte
Feſte im Jahr.
Epiſtel am Tage S. Andreae/
Rom. 10.
MJeļi Braļi/ ja kaßlabb no Ꞩirds titz/ tas tohp
taißnohtz/ vnd ja kaßlabb ar Mutt ißẜacka/
tas tohp ſwähtz. Aiſto tas Raxtz ẜacka/ kas
vs to titz/ tas nhe taps kaunà. Ꞩcheitan nhe
gir ẜawahds Juddis/ ẜawahds Ghreekis/ To
wiſẜo gir weens Kungs/ bagghadtz par wiſẜeem
kattri to peeẜautz. Aiſto kas to Wahrdu
tha Kunga peeẜaux/ tam buhß ẜwähtam tapttaht. Bett ka buhß
teem peeẜaukt/ vs ko tee nhe titz? Bett ka buhß teem titzeht/
no kattru tee nhe gir nheneeka dſirrdeyuſchi? Bett ka buhß
teem dſirrdeht/ bes Mahzetayeem? Bett ka buhß teem mahziet/
ja tee nhe tohp ẜuhtiti? Ka tad raxtietz ſtahw/ ka jaukas
Kahyas gir teem kattri to Meeru paſluddena/ kattri to labbumu
paſluddena. Bett tee nhe gir wiſẜi tam Ewangelio paklauſẜigi/
Aiſto Eſaias ẜacka: Kungs kas titz muhſẜai Mahzibai?
Tad nahk ta Titziba no tahs Mahzibas/ bett ta Mahziba
no to Deewa Wahrdu. Bett es ẜacku: Negg gir tee to
dſirrdeyuſchi? Pattees zaur wiſẜu ſemm gir winja ballxnis
ißghayis/ vnd wiſẜà Paſẜauleh winjo Wahrds.
Evangelium am Tage S. Andreae/
Matth. 4.
JEſus ſtaighadams py to Galileeŗo Juhri/ eeraudſiya
diwi Brahļus/ Simoni/ katters noẜauktz gir
Peteris/ vnd Andres ẜawu Brahļi/ tee eemette ẜawu
Tieklu Juhry/ aiſto tee by Sweineeki. Vnd wings ẜatziya
vs teem: Nahzeeta packaļ mann/ es ghribbu jums
par Zillwäko Sweineekus darriet. Dries attſtahya tee
ẜawus Tieklus/ vnd ghaya packaļ winju. Vnd no tennenes
tahļahk eedams/ eeraudſiya wings zittus diwi
Brahļus/ Jäcobu/ to Dählu Zebedei/ vnd Jahni
ẜawu Brahli/ Laiwà ar ẜawu Tähwu Zebedeo/ ẜawus
Tieklus lahpoht. Vnd wings ẜautze tohß: Tudeļļ attſtahya
tee to Laiwu vnd ẜawu Tähwu/ vnd ghaya
packaļļ winju.
Epiſtel am Tage S. Tohmae/
Epheſ. 1.
SLahwähtz gir Deews vnd tas Tähws muhſẜa Kunga
JEſu CHriſti/ katters mums ẜwehtiyis gir ar daſchadu
gharrigu Ꞩwehtibu/ eekſchan Debbeſkigeem Dahwaneem/
zaur Chriſtum/ ka wings mums arridſan ißwehleyis
gir zaur to paſſchu/ pirms tai Paſẜaulei tas dibbins licktz tappa/
ka mums by ẜwähteems buht vnd nhe peemettigheem
preekſcha winju eekſchan tahß miläſtibas. Vnd gir mums vsjehmis
par Behrneems ẜöw paſſcham/ zaur JEſum CHriſtum/
ka winya Prahtam pattitzis gir/ par Ghohdu ẜawai
krahßnai ſchäläſtibai/ zaur kattru wings mums peejemmigus
darriyis gir/ eekſchan to mieligu.
Evangelium am Tage S. Thomae/
Joh. 20.
vide Dnic. Quaſimodogeniti.
Epiſtel am Tage Pauli Bekehrung/
Act. 9. Cap.
SAulus ẜchņahze wehl draudädams vnd kaudams/ prettie
teem Mahzekļeem ta Kunga. Vnd ghaya py Auxtu=
baſnizaskungu/ vnd luhdſe tam Ghramatas vs Damaſco
py teem Skohlneekeem/ ja tas kahdus vs to paſſchu
zeļļu attraſtu Wierus vnd Ꞩeewas/ wings tohß ẜaſẜeetus
wäßtu vs Jeruſalemes. Vnd kad wings vs zeļļu by/ vnd tuwe
py Damaſco nahze/ apſpiedeya winju peepehſch weena
Ghaißma no Däbbäſẜu/ vnd kritta py Semmes/ vnd dſirrdeya
weenu ballxni/ ta ẜatziya vs winju/ Saul/ Saul/ ko tu
mann prettieprittie ſtahwi? Bett wings ẜatziya: Kungs/ kas eſẜi
tu? Tas Kungs ẜatziya/ Es äßmo JEſus/ kattram tu prettie
ſtahw. Töw ghruht nahxees prettie Ꞩkähpu ẜpahrdiet.
Vnnd wings ẜatziya trieſẜädams vnd biedams/ Kungs/ ko
ghribbi tu/ ko mann buhß darriet? Tas Kungs ẜatziya vs
winju: Zellees aukſcham/ vnd ee=ey Pily/ Teitan töw ẜatzies/
ko töw buhß darriet.
Bett tee Wieri/ kattri winja zeļļaļaudis by/ ſtahweya
vnnd by pahrbiyuſchees/ Aiſto tee dſirrdeya weenu ballxni/
vnd nhe redſeya nhe weenu. Bett Saulus zehlehß aukſcham
no Semmes/ vnnd pazälldams ẜawas Atzis/ nhe redſeya
wings nhe weenu. Bett tee jehme winju py Rohkas/ vnnd
wedde to vs Damaſco/ vnd nhe warreya trieyaß Deenahs
redſeht/ ney ähßdams/ ney dſärrdams.
Bett weens Mahzeklis by eekſchan Damaſco/ ar wahrdu
Ananias/ vs to ẜatziya tas Kungs zaur ghiemi: Anania/
vnd wings ẜatziya/ Ꞩcheitan äßmo es Kungs. Tas Kungs
ẜatziya vs winju/ zellees aukſcham/ vnnd ey eekſchan to Eelu/
kattru ẜautz to Taißnu/ vnd waiza eekſchan to Nammu Juda
pehtz Saulu/ ar Wahrdu no Tarſen/ Aiſto jemm währa/
wings ſkaita Patarus/ vnd gir redſeyis Ghiemy weenu Wieru/
ar wahrdu Ananias/ py ẜöw nahkam/ vnd to Rohku vs
winju leekam/ ka wings attkall redſiegs tohp.
Bett Ananias adbilldeya/ Kungs/ es äßmu no daudſeem
dſirrdeyis no ſcho Wieru/ ka tas dauds nhelaimes taweem
ſwäh-
ſwähteem darriyis gir Jeruſalehmeh/ vnnd tam gir ſcheitan
waļļa no teem Auxteem Baßnizaskungheems/ ẜaiſtiet wiſẜus
kattri tawu Wahrdu peeẜautz. Tas Kungs ẜatziya vs winju:
Ey prohyam/ Aiſto ſchis gir mann weens ißrädſähtz ammatariex/
ka tas mannu Wahrdu näs preekſchan teem Paggaņeem/
vnd preekſchan teem Koninyeem/ vnd preekſchan teem
Bährneem no Jſrael/ Es ghrihbu tam radiet/ ka dauds tam
manna Wahrda dehl zeeſt buhß. Vnd Ananias noghaya vnd
nahze tanny Nammà/ vnd licka tahß Rohkas vs winju/ vnd
ẜatziya: Mieļais Brahli Saul/ tas Kungs gir mann ẜuhtiyis/
kas töw parahdiyees gir vs zeļļu/ ſchurp nahkoht/ ka tu
attkal redſiegs/ vnd ar to ſwähtu Gharru pepilldietz tohpi.
Vnd tudeļļ nokritta tas no winja Atzihms ka ſwieņi/ vnd
tappa attkal redſiegs. Vnd zehlehß aukſcham/ lickahß ẜöw
Chriſtitees vnd jehme Barribu py ẜöw/ vnd attſpirrghahß.
Bett Saulus by daſchu Deenu py teem Mahzekļeem
eekſchan Damaſco/ vnd tudeļļ mahziya wings no CHriſto
eekſchan Skohlahms/ ka tas patz äſẜohtz Deewa Dähls. Bett
tee wiſẜi iſẜabiyayahß/ kattri to dſirrdeya vnd ẜatziya: Negg
gir tas kas eekſchan Jeruſalem ißpohſtiya wiſẜus/ kattri ſcho
Wahrdu peeẜautze/ vnd tapehtz attnahzis/ ka tas tohß ẜaẜaiſtitus
wäſtu py teem auxteem Baſnizaskungeem? Bett
Paulus tappa jo wairahk ſtiprahx/ vnd eerunnaya tohß
Juddus/ kattri eekſchan Damaſco dſiewoya/ vnd apleezenaya/
ka ẜchiß gir tas Chriſtus.
Evangelium am Tage Pauli Bekehrung/
Matth. 19.
PEteris ẜatziya vs JEſu/ Redſi/ mehß äſẜam wißnotaļļ
attſtahyuſchi/ vnd äſẜam ar töw ghayuſchi/ kas
attlätz mums no to? Bett JEſus ẜatziya vs teem: Pattees
es ẜacku jums/ ka juhß/ kattri juhß eſẜeeta ar mann
ghayuſchi/ eekſchan tahß Attdſimbſchanas/ kad tha Zillwäka
Dähls ẜehdehß vs to Krähßlu ẜawas Ghodibas/

Vnd kas attſtah Ähkus/ jeb Brahļus/ jeb Mahſẜas/

Tierumus/ manna Wahrda dehļ/ tas to ẜimbtkahrtige
jembs/ vnd to muhſchigu dſiewoſchanu ee=manntohß.
Bett dauds kattri gir tee Pirrmi/ buhß tee Pehdeyi/ vnd
tee Pehdeyi/ buhß tee Pirrmi.
Epiſtel am Tage der Reinigung Mariae/
Malach. 3.
RAughi/ es ghribbu ẜawu Engeli ẜuhtiet/ kattram mannà
preekſchà to zeļļu ẜataiſẜiet buhß/ vnd dries nahx py
ẜawas Baſnizas tas Kungs/ kattru juhß meckleyeeta/
vnd tas Engels tahß ẜaliedſenaſchanas/ kattru juhß ghribbaht/
Raughi/ tas nahk/ ẜacka tas Kungs Zebaoth. Bett
kas warrehß to Deenu winja Attnahkſchanas pazeeſt? Vnd
kas paſtahwehß/ kad wings paradieſẜees? Aiſto wings gir
ka tas Vgguns weena Ꞩuddrabkalleya/ vnd ka tahß Seepes
tahß Maſghatayas/ wings ẜehdehß vnd kauſẜehß/ vnd to
Ꞩuddrabu tieries. Wings tohß Bährnus Lewi ſkieſties vnd
tieries ka Ꞩuddrabu/ vnd tad tee tam Kungam barriba Vpperi
neſẜies/ eekſchan Taißnibas/ vnd tam Kungam labbe
pattix/ tas barriba Vpperis Juda vnd Jeruſalem/ ka zittà
reiſà vnd pirms daudſeem ghaddeem.
Evangelium am Tage der Reinigung Ma-
riae/ Luc. 2.
VNd kad tas Deenas winjo Skieſtiſchanas pehtz to
Baußli Moſis nahze/ neſẜe tee to (Bährnu JEſum)

Wiſẜam Wieriſkam kas wißpirrmahk to Maht attpleſſch/
buhß tam Kungam
ẜwähtitam tapt. Vnd ka tee
dohtu to Vpperi/ ka ẜatzietz
gir eekſchan to Baußlu tha
Kunga/ weenu pahri Vhbeļa=Balloſchus/
jeb diwi

Vnd raughi/ weens Zillwähx
by eekſchan Jeruſalemes/
ar wahrdu Simeon/ vnd tas pahtz Zillwähx by

Jſraël/ vnd tas Ꞩwähtz Gharrs by eekſchan to/ tam
by weena Adbilldeſchana kļu=uſẜi no to Ꞩwähtu Gharru/

tha Kunga redſeyis by. Vnd nahze zaur eedoſchanu

Vnd kad tee Wätzaki to Bährnu JEſum Baſnizà
ee=neſẜe/ ka tee par to darritu/ ka tas eeraddums by/ pehtz

Kungs/ nu leetz tu tawu Kallpu Meerà aisbraukt/

Aiſto mannas Atzis gir tawu Peſtitayu redſeyuſchi.
Kattru tu ẜataiſẜiyis eſẜi wiſẜeems Ļaudeems parr
labb.
Weena ghaißma tohß Paggaņus apghaiſmoht/
vnd par ghohdu tawo Ļauſcho Jſrael.
Am Tage der Verkündigung Mariae/
Eſa. 7.
TAs Kungs runnaya vs Ahas/ vnd ẜatziya: Praſẜais
weenu Siem no to Kungu tawu Deewu/ jeb appakſchan
Elles dſiļļumà/ jeb aukſcham paſſchà Auxtumà.
Bett Ahas ẜatziya/ es nhe ghribbu praſẜiet/ ka es to Kungu
nhe kahrdenayo. Tad ẜatziya wings: Tad dſirrdeeta juhß no
to Nammu Dawid: Nhe gir tas ghann/ ka juhß teem Ļaudeem
ļaun darraht/ jums buhß arridſan mannu Deewu apkaitenaht?
Tapehtz jums tas Kungs patz weenu Siem dohß/
Raughi/ weena Jumprawa gir apghrutenata/ vnnd peedſimbs
weenu Dählu/ to tha dehwehß Jmmanuel/ Ꞩweeſtu
vnd Jählu=Mäddu tas ehdies/ ka tas ſinna to ļaunumu
attmeſt/ vnd to labbumu ißwehleht.
Evangelium am Tage der Verkündigung
Mariae/ Luc. 1. Cap.
SÄßtà Mehneſẜi tappa tas Engels Gabriels ẜuhtietz
no Deewu weenà Pily eekſchan Galilea/ ta Wahrds
ir Nazareth/ py weenas Jumprawas/ kattra ẜadärräta
by weenam Wieram ar wahrdu Joſeps no to zilltu
Dawida/ vnd ta Jumprawa dehwehya Maria. Vnd
tas Engels nahze py tahß eekſchan/ vnd ẜatziya/ Deews
pallieds töw tu pilla (
puta,
no Deewu.) ſchälaſtibas/ tas
Kungs gir ar töw/ tu auxteteitzama no Ꞩeewahm. Bett
winja to rädſädama/ ißtruhzenayahß tha par winja
Wallodu/ vnd domaya/ kahda Ꞩweizenaſchana gir ta?
Vnd tas Engels ẜatziya vs tahß/ nhe byeſtees Maria/
tu eſẜi ſchäläſtibu py Deewu attradduſẜi/ Reds/ tu tapſi
apghrutenata eekſchan Meeſẜas/ vnd peedſimſẜi weenu
Dählu/ tha Wahrdu buhß töw JEſus dehweht/ tas
buhß leels/ vnd taps weens Dähls tha Wiſẜaauxtaka
dähwähtz/ vnd Deews tas Kungs dohß tam to Krähßlu
ẜawa Tähwa Dawida/ vnd tas buhß weens Konings
par to Nammu Jacob muhſchige/ vnd tha Koninja=
Wallſtiba nhe mittehſẜees/
Tad ẜatziya Maria vs to Engeli/ ka buhß tam notickt?
Aiſto es nhe ſinnohß no kahdu Wieru? Tas Engels
adbilldeya vnd ẜatziya vs tahß: Tas Ꞩwähtz
Gharrs par töw nahx/ vnd tas ſpähx tha Wiſẜa=auxtaka
töw apähnohß. Tapehtz arridſan tas Ꞩwähtais/
kas no töw peedſimbs/ taps Deewa Dählß ẜaucktz.
Vnd jemm währa/ Eliſabeth/ tawa Radda/ gir arridſan
apghrutenata ar weenu Dählu wätza buhdama/
vnd eet nu ſäſtà Mehneſẜy/ kattrai tahda Ꞩlawa gir/ ka
tha nhe=aughliga äſẜoti. Aiſto Deews warr wiſẜas leetas
darriet. Bett Maria ẜatziya: Redſi/ es äßmu tha
Kunga Kallpone/ mann noteek/ ka tu ẜatziyis eſẜi. Vnd
tas Engelis ſkierehß no tahß.

Epheſ. 2.
MJeļi Brahļi/ Juhß nhe eſẜeeta wairs Weeſẜis/ vnnd
Ꞩweſſchineeki/ (
Dunaeburg,
Kirweneeki.) bett Nammneeki
ar teem ẜwähteem/ vnd Deewa Ꞩaime/ vstaiſẜiti

CHriſtus tas Kackta=ackmins gir/ vs kattru wis tas Darrbs

Evangelium am Tage Philippi vnd Jacobi/
Johan. 14.
JEſus ẜatziya vs ẜaweem Mahzekļeem: Juhſẜai
Ꞩirrdei nhe buhß ißbietees/ Titzaht juhß vs Deewu/
tad titzaht juhß arridſan vs mann. Mannà Tähwa
Nammà gir dſiewoſchanas ghann/ kad tas ta nhe buhtu/
tad ghribbätu es ẜatziet
vs jums/ es no=eemu jums
to Weetu ẜattaiſẜiet. Vnd
jeb es no=eetu jums to Weetu
ẜattaiſẜiet/ ghribbu esghribbues tomähr
attkall atteet/ vnd
juhß py mann jembt/ ka
juhß eſẜeeta kur es äßmu/
vnd kurr es no=eemu/ to ſinnaht
juhß/ vnd to zeļļu ſinnaht juhß arridſan.
Ꞩacka vs to Thomas/ Kungs/ mehß nhe ſiñam/ kurrpu
tu ey/ vnd ka warram mehß to zeļļu ſinnaht? JEſus
ẜacka vs to: Es äßmu tas Zellſch/ vnd ta Taißniba/ vnd
ta Dſiewiba. Nheweens nhenahk py Tähwu/ ka zaur
mann. Kad juhß mann paſietaht/ tad paſietaht juhß
arridſan mannu Tähwu/ vnnd no ſcho laiku paſieſtaht
juhß to/ vnd eſẜeeta to redſeyuſchi.
Ꞩacka vs to Wilipps/
(Letti
Lipſts.) Kungs/ rahdi
mums to Tähwu/ tad gir mums ghann. JEſus ẜacka vs
to: Tick illge äßmu es py jums/ vnd tu mann nhe paſieſti.
Wilip (Lipſti/) kas mann räds/ tas räds to Tähwu/ ka
ẜacki tu tad/ Rahdi mums to Tähwu? Nhe titzi tu/ ka
es eekſchan to Tähwu/ vnd tas Tähws eekſchan mann
gir? Tohß Wahrdus kattrus es vs jums runnayo/ tohß
nhe runnayo es no ẜöw paſſchu. Bett tas Tähws katters
eekſchan mann dſiewo/ tas patz darra tohß darrbus.
Titzaht mann/ ka es eekſchan Tähwu/ vnnd tas
Tähws eekſchan mann gir/ ja nhe/ tad titzaht jehle man
to Darrbo dehļ. Pattees/ Pattees/ es ẜacko jums/ kas
vs mann titz/ tas arridſan tohß darrbus darries/ kattrus
es darro/ vnd leelakus nhe ka ſchohß darries/ aiſto
es eemo py Tähwu. Vnnd ko juhß luhxeeta eekſchan
mannu Wahrdu/ to ghribbu es darriet/ ka tas Tähws
ghohdahtz tohp eekſchan to Dählu. Ko juhß luhxeeta
eekſchan mannu Wahrdu/ to ghribbu es darriet.
Epiſtel am Tage Johannis des Täuffers/
Eſaiae 40.
EEpreezenayeeta/ eepreezenayeeta mannus Ļaudis/ ẜacka
juhſẜo Deews/ runnayeeta ar Jeruſalem ẜirrdige/ vnd
mahzaita tai/ ka winja (
a
) Darrbs pa ghallam gir/
Aiſto winja Noſeedſiba gir peedohta/ aiſto ta gir diwekahrtige
dabbuyuſẜi no ta Kunga Rohku/ wiſẜo winjo Ghräko
dehļ.
a
(Darrbs)
Das im Hebreiſchen das Wort
ſtehe/ weiß ich woll/
vnnd daß es einem Streit/ oder Kriegsmacht heiſſe/ weiß ich auch
wol/ daher auch GOtt/ der HErr Zebaoth/ das iſt der HErr der
Heerſcharen genennet wird. Das ichs aber durchs Wort
(Darrbs/
welchs heiſt eine Arbeit/ ein Werckt) gedolmetſcht/ daß hab ich vmb
der eigentlichen meinung willen gethan/ die mir der gantze
contex-
tus
an die hand gegeben. Denn was ſonſten obgedachtes Wort
TSEBA
mehr ins gemein Iob. 7. v. 1.) vnnd inſonderheit (Nu-
heiſſe/ das wiſſen die Theologi, ſo der heiligen He-
breiſchen Sprache kündig ſind.
Turr gir weens ballxnis weena Mahzetaya Tuxneſẜy/
ẜattaiſẜeeta tham Kungam to zeļļu/ darraita wirſẜon lauku
ghluddänu zeļļu muhſẜam Deewam/ wiſẜahm Ee=leiyahm
buhß pa=auxtenatahm tapt/ vnd wiſẜeem Kallneem vnd Zällmeem
buhß noſämmoteem tapt/ vnnd kas nheliedſans gir/
buhß liedſänam/ vnd kas nhetaißnis gir/ buhß taißnam tapt/
Aiſto tha Kunga ghodam buhß ſinnamam tapt/ vnnd wiſẜa
meeſẜa redſehß/ ka tha Kunga Mutte runna.
Evangelium am Tage Johannis des Täuf-
fers/ Luc. 1.
ELiſabethes laix nahze/ ka tay weßteeß by/ vnnd ta
weddehß weenu Dählu. Vnd winja Kaimiņņi vnd
Raddi dſirrdeya/ ka tas
Kungs leelu ſchäläſtibu py
winjas darriyis by/ vnnd
preezayahß ar winju. Vnd
tas notickahß aſtotà Deenà/
nahze tee apghraiſiet
to Behrninju/ vnd dehweya
to ẜawa Tähwa wahrdà
Zacharias. Bett winja
Mahte adbilldeya/ vnd ẜatziya: Nhe/ bett tham buhß
Jaņam no=ẜaucktam buht. Vnd tee ẜatziya vs winjas:
Nhe weens nhe gir tawà Raddà/ kam tahds Wahrds
gir? Vnd tee mirckſchkinaya (
propriè
mit Augen
.) ẜawam
Tähwam/ ka wings to ghribbätu dehweht lickt. Vnnd
wings praſẜiya weenu ghalldinyu/ raxtiya vnd ẜatziya:
Winja Wahrds gir Janis. Vnnd tee iſẜabrienoyahß
wiſẜi/ vnd tuhdeļļ tappa winja Mutte vnnd Mehle attſwabbinata/
vnd runnaya Deewu ſlawädams. Vnnd
weena Jßbaile nahze par wiſẜeem Kaimiņņeem. Vnnd
wiſẜa ſchy leeta tappa ſinnama par wiſẜu to Juddo Kallnu.
Vnd wiſẜi kattri to dſirrdeya/ jehmehß py Ꞩirrds/
vnnd ẜatziya/ ko ſkeet tu/ kas buhß no ſcho Behrninju?
Aiſto tha Kunga Rohka by ar to.
Vnd winja Tähws Zacharias tappa pills no to ſwähtu
Gharru/ mahziya/ ẜatzidams:
Ꞩlawähtz gir tas Kungs/ tas Deews Jſrael/ Aiſto
tas gir peemeckleyis/ vnd peſtiyis ẜawus Ļaudis.
Vnnd gir mums pazehlis weenu Raggu tahß Peſtiſchanas/
eekſchan to Nammu ẜawa Kallpa Dawid.
Ka tas pirrmayohß laikohß runnayis gir zaur to
Mutt ẜawo ſwähto Proweeto.
Ka tas mums peſtitu no muhſẜeem Eenaideneekeem/
vnd no to Rohku wiſẜo tho kattri mums eenied.
Vnnd to ſchäläſtibu paradietu muhſẜeem Tähweem/
vnd attghada=tohß ẜawas ſwähtas ẜaliedſenaſchanas.
Vnd tahß Swehreſchanas/ kattru tas ſwehreyis gir
muhſẜam Tähwam Abrahamam/ mums doht.
Ka mehß peſtiti tohpam/ no tahß Rohkas muhſẜo
Waideneeko/ vnnd tam Kallpoyam bes bieſchanas tick
illge ka mehß dſiewoyam.
Eekſchan Ꞩwehtibas vnnd Taißnibas/ kattra tam
pattiek.
Vnd tu Behrnings tapſi weens Proweetz tha Wiſẜa=
auxtaka dähwähtz/ tu eeẜi preekſchan to Kungu/ ka tu
tam to Zeļļu ẜataiſẜi.
Vñ Adſiſchanu tahß Peſtiſchanas dohd ẜaweem Ļaudeem/
kattra gir eekſchan winjo Ghräko Peedoſchanu.
Zaur to Ꞩirdsdibbenigu ſchäläſtibu muhſẜa Deewa/
zaur kattru mums peemeckleyis gir tas Auſtrums no
tahß Auxtibas.
Ka tas atſpiedätu teem/ kattri ẜehſch Tumbſẜumà/
vnd nahwes ähnà/ vnd ißtaiſẜitu muhſẜas Kahyas vs
to zeļļu tha Meera.
Vnd tas Bernings augha/ vnnd tappa ſtippris eekſchan
Gharru/ vnd by Tuxneſẜy/ teekams ka tam by preekſcha
nahkt/ preekſchan teem Ļaudeem Jſrael.
Epiſtel am Tage S. Petri vnd S. Pauli/
Act. 12.
TAs Konings Herodes peelicka tahß Rohkas py zitteem
no tahß draudzes tohß mohziet. Bett wings nomaitaya
to Jäcobu Jana Brahli ar Sobeni. Vnnd kad
wings redſeya/ ka tas teem Juddeem patticka/ ẜayehme tas
irr Peteri. Bett tanny paſſchà laikà by tahß Deenas tahß
Ꞩalldahß=maiſes. Kad wings to nu ẜayehme/ licka wings to
Zeetumà/ vnd nodewe to tſchettreem tſchetterdaļļeem Karra=
wiereem/ to ghlabboht/ vnnd ſkittahß to pehtz Leeldeen teem
Ļaudeem preekſcha weſt. Vnd teeſẜa/ Peteris tappa Zeetumà
turrähtz/ bett ta Draudſe luhdſe par to Deewu beß mitteſchanas.
Vnnd kad Herodes to ghribbeya preekſcha weſt/
tanny paſſchà nackty ghulleya Peteris ſtarrpa diweem Karyawiereem/
ẜaſẜeetz ar diweem Kehdehm/ vnnd tee Ꞩarrghi
preekſchan Durrweem ẜarrghaya to Zeetumu.
Vnd reds/ tas Engels ta Kungha attghaya/ vnd weena
ghaißma ſpiedeya eekſchan to ähku/ vnd ẜitta Peteri Ꞩahnohß/
vnd vsmohdenaya to/ vnd ẜatziya/ zellees tickuſẜche
aukſcham/ vnd tahß Kehdes kritta tam no winja Rohkahm.
Vnd tas Engels ẜatziya vs to/ apyohſẜees/ vnd apwellzees ẜawas
Kurrpes. Vnd tas darriya tha. Vnd wings ẜatziya vs to:
Apmettees ẜawu Mehteli apkahrt ẜöw/ vnd nahtz ar mann.
Vnd tas ißghaya/ vnd ghaya winyam packaļļ/ vnd nhe ſinnaya/
ka tas tam itt teeſcham noticktu zaur to Engeli/ bett
tas ſkitta weenu ghiemi rädſohtz.
Bett tee ghaya zaur to pirrmu vnd ohtru Wackti/ vnd
nahze py teem dſällſa Durrweem/ kattras vs Jällghawu eet/
tahß no ẜöw paſſcheem attdarriyahß. Vnd ißghaya/ vnd
ghaya weenu Eelas gharrumu/ vnd tudeļļ ſkierehß tas Engels
no to. Vnd kad Peteris attghahdayahß/ ẜatziya tas/ Nu
ſinnu es teeſcham/ ka tas Kungs ẜawu Engeli ẜuhtiyis gir/
vnd mann ißpeſtiyis no to Rohku Herodis/ vnd no wiſẜu
ẜarrghaſchanu to Juddo Ļauſcho.
Evangelium am Tage S. Petri vnnd S.
Pauli/ Matth. 16.
JEſus nahze eekſchan
teem Eſcheem tahß
Pilis Ceſarea Wilippi/ vnd
waizaya ẜawus Mahzekļus
vnd ẜatziya/ ko ẜacka
tee Ļaudis/ kas ta Zillwäka
Dähls äſẜohtz? Tee ẜatziya:
Zitti ẜacka/ tu äſẜohtz
Janis tas Chriſtetais: Zitti/ tu äſẜohtz Elias/ zitti/ tu
äſẜohtz Jeremias/ jeb weens no teem Proweeteem.
Wings ẜatziya vs teem: Ko ẜackaht tad juhß/ kas es
äſẜohtz? Tad adbilldeya Simon Peteris/ vnd ẜatziya/
Tu eſẜi CHriſtus/ ta dſiewa Deewa Dähls.
Vnd JEſus adbilldeya vnd ẜatziya vs to: Ꞩwähtz
eſẜi tu Simon Jonaſa Dähls/ aiſto Meeſẜas vnd Aſẜins
nhe gir töw to ẜatziyuſchi/ bett manns Tähws Debbeſẜies.
Vnd es ẜacku töw arridſan/ tu eſẜi Peteris/ vnd
vs ſcho zeetu Ackmini ghribbu es vstaiſẜiet ẜawu Drauds/
vnd teem Wahrteem tahß Elles nhe buhß to vswahreht.
Vnd ghribbu töw tahß Däbbäſẜo=wallſtibas Attſläghas
doht/ Wiß ko tu vs Semmes ẜeeſẜi/ buhß arridſan
Debbeſẜies ẜeetam buht/ vnd wiß ko tu vs Semmes
attẜeeſẜi/ buhß arridſan Debbeſẜies attẜeetam buht. Tad
aißleedſe wings ẜaweem Mahzekļeem/ ka teem nhe by
nhe weenam ẜatziet/ ka wings JEſus/ tas CHriſtus
äſẜohtz.
Epiſtel am Tage Mariae Heimsuchung/
Rom. 12.
vide Dnic. 2.
nach der Erſchei-
nung CHriſti.
Evangelium am Tage Mariae Heimſu-
chung/ Luc. 1.
MAria mettehß kahyop tannies Deenahß/ vnd ghaya
par to Kallnu tickuſche/ vs to Pili Juda/ vnd
nahze eekſchan to Nammu Zacharias/ vnd ſweizenaya
Eliſabeth. Vnd tas notickahß/ kad Eliſabeth to Ꞩweizenaſchanu
Mariae dſirrdeya/ deedams lehze tas
Bährns winja Meeſẜahß. Vnnd Eliſabeth tappa no
to Ꞩwähtu Gharru pilla/
vnd brehze ſtippre/ ẜatzidama:
Teickta eſẜi tu no
tahm Ꞩeewahm/ vnd teickta
gir ta Aughle tawas
Meeſẜas/ vnd no kurrenes
tas mann nahkahß/ ka tha
Mahte manna Kungha
py mann nahk? Redſi/ kad
es to ballxni tawas Ꞩweizenaſchanas dſirrdeyu/ preezadammees
lähze tas Bährns mannahß Meeſẜahß.
Vnd O ſwähta eſẜi tu/ kattra tu titzeyuſẜi eſẜi/ Aiſto tas
taps peepilldietz/ kas töw ẜatzietz gir no to Kungu.
Vnd Maria ẜatziya.
Manna Dwehſẜele teitz to Kunghu/ vñ manns Gharrs
epreehzeenayahß par to Deewu mannu Peſtitayu.
Aiſto tas gir to Sämmoſchanu ẜawas Kallpones
vsraudſiyis/ Redſi no ſcho laiku mann ẜwätu teix wiſẜi/
Bährno Bährni.
Aiſto tas gir leelu leethu py man darriyis/ katters
Spehziegs gir/ vnd kattra wahrds Swähtz gir.
Vnd winja Schälaſtiba palleek no weenas Zilltas ihs
ohtras/ py teems/ kattri to biya.
Tas gir ſpehziegs ar ẜawu Ällkonu/ vnd ißkaiſẜa tohß
kattri gräßni gir ẜawas Ꞩirds prahtà.
Tas gruſch tohß Spehzigus no to Kräſlu/ vnnd pazeļļ
tohs Sämmoſchus aukſcham.
Tohß Jßallkuſchus peepillda tas arr Labbibu/ vnnd
attſtay tohs Baggatus tuckſchus.
Tas peeminn tahs ſchälaſtibas/ vnnd vspallieds ẜawam
Kallpam Jſrael.
Ka tas gir runnayis muhſẜeem Tähweem/ Abraham
vnd winja Ꞩäklam muhſchige.
Vnnd Maria palicka py tahs py trim Mehneſẜeem/
pehtz greeſehs ta attkal vs Mahyu.
Epiſtel am S. Michaelis tage/
Apocal. 12.
WEens Karrſch pazehlees ẜöw Debbeſẜies/ Mickelis vnd
winja Engeļi Karŗoya ar to Satana/ vnd tas Satanas
Karŗoya/ vnd winja Engeļi/ vnd nhe vswahreya/
neds arridſan winjo Weeta tappa Debbeſẜies attraſta. Vnd
tas leels Puhkis/ ta wätza Tſchuhßka/ kattrai wahrds gir
tas Wälls vnd Satanas tappa ißmäſtz/ katters wiſẜu to
Paſẜaul ar Wiltu wadda/ vnd tappa mäſtz wirſẜon Sem̃es/
vnd winja Engeļi tappa arridſan nomäſti.
Vnd es dſirrdeya weenu leelu bàllxne/ ta ẜatziya Debbeſẜies/
Nu gir ta Peſtiſchana/ vnd tas Spähx/ vnd ta
Wallſtiba/ vnd ta Warra muhſẜa Deewa/ ẜawa CHriſtus
tappuſẜi/ tapehtz ka tas ißmäſtz gir/ katters tohß apẜuhdſeya
Deenas vnd Nacktis preekſchan Deewu. Vnd tee gir to vswarreyuſchi
zaur ta Jähra Aſẜini/ vnd zaur to Wahrdu ẜawas
leezibas/ vnd nhe gir ẜawu dſiewibu mieļoyuſchi/ ihß to
Nahwu. Tapehtz liexmoyeetees juhs Debbeſẜes/ vnd kattri
tur eekſchan dſiewo.
Evangelium am Tage S. Michaelis/
Matth. 18.
TEe Mahzekli ghaya py JEſu vnnd ẜatziya: Kas
gir tas Prawakais Debbeſẜo=Wallſtibà? JEſus
aizenaya weenu Bährnu
py ẜöw/ vnd wedde to widdu
ſtarrpan teem/ vnd ẜatziya:
Pattees/ es ẜacku
jums/ Ja juhß nhe apghreſchatees/
vnd tohpeeta ka
tee Bährni/ tad juhß Debbeſẜo=Wallſtibà
nhe nahxeta.
Kas ẜöw patz ẜämmoyahß
ka ſchis Bährns/ tas
gir tas Prahwakays Debbeſẜo=Wallſtibà/
vnnd kas
tahdu Bährnu vsjämm eekſchan mannu Wahrdu/ tas
vsjämm mann. Bett kas weenu no ſcheem wiſẜeem maſakeem
apghrehzi/ kattri eekſchan mann titz/ tam buhtu
labbahk/ ka tam weens Dſirna=ackminns py winja Riekles
pakahrtz taptu/ vnd apſlietzenahtz taptu Juhri/ kurr
wißdſiļļahk gir.
Way tai Paſẜaulei tahs apghrehzibas dehl. Apghrehzibai
buhß jo nahkt/ bett tomähr way tam Zillwäkam/
zaur kattru Apghrehziba nahk. Bett ja töw
tawa Rohka jeb tawa Kahya Karrina/ no zehrt to/
vnnd mett to no ẜöw/ tas gir töw labbahk/ ka tu eekſchan
dſiewoſchanas Tiſlis/ jeb Krohplis ee=ey/ nhe ka
töw diwi Rohkas/ jeb Kahjas gir/ vnd tohpi eekſchan
to muhſchigu Vgguni ee=mäſts. Vnnd ja töw tawa
Atz Karrina/ ißrau to aran/ vnnd mett to no ẜöw/ tas
gir töw labbahk/ ka tu ar weenu Atzi eekſchan dſiewoſchanas
ee=ey/ nhe ka töw diwi Atzis gir/ vnd tohpi Elles
Vgguny eemäſts.
Peeraughaita/ ka juhß nhe weenu no ſcheem nitzinayeeta:
Aiſto es ẜacku jums: Winjo Engeļi Debbeſẜies/
räds allaſchien to Waighu manna Tähwa Debbeſẜies.
Aiſto tha Zillwäka Dähls gir natzis/ ſwähtus darriet
tohs kattri paſudduſchi gir.
Evangelium von der Tauffe Chriſti/
Matth. 3. Cap.
TAnny laikà nahze JEſus aran Galileero Semmes/
py to (vppi) Jordan py Jani/ ka tas ẜöw no
to licktees chriſtitees. Bett Janis leedſe tam/ vnd ẜatziya/
Mann buhtu ghan wayaga biyis/ ka es no töw
chriſtietz taptu/ vnd tu nahz py mann? Bett JEſus
adbildeya/ ẜatzidams vs to: Laid nu to tha buht/ tha
peeklayahß mums wiſẜu Taißnibu peepilldiet. Tad ļahwe
wings tam.
Vnd kad JEſus chriſtietz by/ ißkahpe Wings dries
aran to Vdeni. Vnd redſi/ tad attwehrehß tas Debbeß
par Winju. Vnnd Janis redſeya to Deewa Gharru/
ihten ka kahdu Ballodi ſemmeh nolaiſchohtz/ vnnd par
winyu nahkam. Vnd redſi weens Ballxnis no Debbes
ẜatziya: Ꞩchiß gir manns mieļais Dähls/ py kattru
mann labbs Prahtz gir (
vel,
katters mann pattiek.)
Epiſtel am Friedenstage/ welcher Jährlich
im Fürſtenthumb Churland vnd Semgallen/ auff an-
ordnung Fürſtl. Durchl. Hertzog Gotthardts/
etc.
Chriſt-
milder gedächtniß/ wegen des zwiſchen dem Pohlen vnnd Moßco-
viter/ betreffend den Lieffländiſchen Krieg/
anno 1582.
durch ſon-
derbare ſchickung Gottes/ getroffen Friedens/ den 15. Ja-
nuarij ſeyerlich gehalten wird.
Syrach. 50.
NV pateizeeta wiſẜi deewam/ katters leelas Leetas darra
wiſẜahß Maļļahß/ katters mums no Mahtes Meeſẜas
dſiewus vs turr/ vnd darra mums wiſẜu labbu. Wings
ghribbätu mums doht preezighu Ꞩirrdi/ vnd doht allaſchien
Meeru muhſẜohß Laikohß eekſchan Jſrael. Vnnd ka winja
Ꞩchälaſtiba allaſch py mums pa=leek/ vnnd attpeſti mums/
teekams mehß dſiewoyam.
Ewangelium
Meera=Deena/
Luc. 13. Cap.
TAnny laykà paſluddenaya zitti tam Kungam JEſu
no teem Galileeŗeem/ kattro Aſẜini Pilatus ar
winyo Vpperi ẜajautzis by. Vnd JEſus adbilldeya vnd
ẜatziya vs teem: Skeetaht juhß/ ka ſchee Galileeŗi par
wiſẜeem Galileeŗeem Ghräzeneeki biyuſſchi gir/ tapehtz
kad tee to zeetuſſchi gir? Es ẜacku/ Nhe/ Bett ja juhß
nhe tapſẜeeta labbaki/ tad irr juhß wiſẜi arridſan tha tapſẜeeta
nomaitati. Jeb ſkeetaht juhß/ ka tee aſtohņpadeßmitti/
vs kattreem tas Tuhrnis eekſchan Siloha kritta/
vnnd noẜitta tohß/ gir noſeguſſchi par wiſẜeem Zillwäkeem/
kattri eekſchan Jeruſalemes dſiewo? Es ẜacku/
Nhe: Bett ja juhß nhe tapſẜeeta labbaki/ tad irr juhß
wiſẜi tha tapſẜeeta nomaitati.
Bett wings ẜatzija teem ſchadu Liedſibu: Zillwäkam
by weens Wiega=Kohx/ taß by dehſtietz ẜawà Wiena=Kallnà/
vnd nahze/ Aughļus no to meckleht/ vnnd
tohß nhe attradda. Tad ẜatzija wings vs to Wiena=
Dahrßneeku: Redſi/ Es äßmu nu tries Ghaddohß ick=
ghaddohß nahzis/ vnd Aughļus meckkleyis/ vs ſcho Wieges=Kohku/
vnnd tohß nhe attrohmu/ no=zehrt to/ ko
kahwe tas to Semmi? Bett tas adbilldeja/ ẜatzidams
vs winju: Kungs/ ļaw winju wehl ſcho Ghaddu/ teekam
Es apkahrt to rohku/ vnd apẜuhdo to/ arrieg
wings Aughļus näßtu/ Ja nhe/ tad pehtz
nozehrt to.
Die trawrige Hiſtoria der er-
bärmlichen
Zerſtörung der Statt
Jeruſalem/ 40. Jahr nach des
HErren Chriſti Leiden.
Hiebevor in Lettiſcher Sprache nie ge-
ſehen/ itzo aber verſetzet/ vnd zum an-
dern mahl vberſehen.
Durch
GEORGIVM MANCELIVM
Semgallum,
der H. Schrifft
Licentiatum,
vnd itzigen Fürſtl. Churländ. Hoffprediger.
Ad Zoilum.
Serviat omne DEO ſtudium, fremat Orbis & Orcus:
Rumpatur Momus: Sat placuiſſe DEO.
Cum Grat. & Privileg. Sereniſ. Reg. Svec.
Gedruckt uz Riga in Lieffland/ durch vnd in
Verlegung Gerhard Schröders/ 1644.
Hiſtoria
Von der Zerſtörung der
Statt Jeruſalem Lettiſch.
KAd tas laix daggaya/ kad Deews ghribbeya
par Jeruſalem/ vnd teem Juddo ļaudeem ẜawy Dußmibu
iß=krattiet/ ka tee Proweetes/ vnnd tas Kungs
Chriſtus patz teem by draudeyuſchi/ vnd papreekſch ẜatziyuſſchi/
gir ſchahß Siemes pirrmahk rädſätas.
Py Däbbäſẜu gir weena Aſtita=Swaigſne rädſäta ka kahds
Sohbens/ kattra wiſẜu Ghaddas=kahrtu par to Pili ſtahweya/ vnd
ick=kattris Zillwähx to redſeya.
Jtt paſſchahß Leeldenas/ app to aſtotu Stundu Nackty/ 8.
Aprill gir py to Alltari Baßnizà tahds ſkaidris ſpohſch ghaiſchums
attſpiedeyis/ ka ick=kattris ſkitta/ Deenu äſẜam.
Weenas waŗŗas leelas ſtippras Wahrtis/ eekſchan to eekſkigu
Baßnizu/ kuŗŗas diwi deßmitteem Wiereem zellt by/ ghribbädami
tahs attdarriet/ katras ar ſtipprahm Attſlägham vnnd Dſällſa=
klinckeem by apdarrinatas/ gir ẜów paſſchas app to ẜäßtu Stundu
Nackty attdarriyuſchaß. 21. Junij. App Ꞩehna laiku gir rädſäti
Paddebbeſẜies Ratti=liddinayammees/ vnnd ka kahds leels Spähx
no Jahtneekeem vnd Kahyeneekeem Paddebbeſẜies ẜa=eiyoht/ vnd
kohpa kauyohtees nackty. To Deenu pirrms Waſẜara Ꞩwähtkeem/
kad tee Baßnizaskungi eekſchan to Baßnizu ghribbeyuſchi
ẜattaiſẜiet/ kas vs Ꞩwähtkeem wayadſeya/ gir tee leelu dimbdu/
vnd pehtz weenu Ballxni dſirrdeyuſchi/ kattra gir brähkuſẜi/ laideeta
mums no ſchennenes nohſt behgt. Jeb tomähr zitti ẜacka/ tas
äſẜohtz to laiku no titzis/ kad tas preekſchkarrayams Autz Baßnizà
CHriſto mirrſtoht/ gir ẜaplieſẜis.
Tur gir arridſan weens Zillwähx biyis/ JEſus/ Anani dähwähtz/
nabbaga Wiera Dähls/ tas patz nahkdams Jeruſalemeh
vs teem Waſẜaraſwähtkeem/ gir ar leelu ſtippru Gharru brehzis:
Ock weena Kleekſchana no Auſtrumas/ ock weena Kleekſchana no
Wackara puſẜes/ ick weena Kleekſchana no tſchettreem Wehyeem/
weena Kleekſchana par wiſẜu Jeruſalem vnnd to Baßnizu/ weena
leela Waida par Bruht vnd Brudgamu/ weena Kleckſchana par
wiſẜeem Ļaudeem. Vnd ta wings Deenas vnd Nacktis waideya/
vnd ſkreya ka trax apkahrt eekſchan to Pili. Vnnd jebſche Winju
ziti ar Pahtagahm vnd Riextehm ſchaute/ kattri ſchohß Wahrdus
ka nhelabbus par to Pili labpraht nhe dſirrdeya/ tad tomähr
Wings nhe zeete kluß.
Vnnd kad ſchiß Zillwähx preekſchan to Semmeſẜohgi no=
wäſts gir/ kattru tee Römeŗi eelickuſchi by/ katters to arridſan ar
Patagahm ghauſche lieds patt Aſẜinim ſchauſt licka/ tomähr nhe
gir Wings nhe ar weenu Wahrdu ſchälaſtibu luhdſees/ nei kahdu.
Aſẜaru ißlaidis/ bett bes mitteſchanas wiſẜà ghallwà brehzis/
Way/ Way/ töw/ O tu nabbaga Jeruſalem. Albinus tas Ꞩohgis
gir to ka kahdu Jegki ẜmehyis. Bet ſchiß Zillwähx nhe gir
